Iyi modoka yakozwe n’abanyeshuri 12 biga muri kaminuza yitwa Singhad Technical Education Society (STES)-Rwanda yamurikiwe ibitangazamakuru kuwa gatanu tariki ya 28 Werurwe 2017.
Bagaragaje uko iyo modoka ikora, ndetse bamwe bayigendamo banamenyeshwa ko mu minsi ya vuba ishobora kuzashyirwa ku isoko ababishaka bakajya bayigura bakayikoresha nk’izindi modoka zisanzwe.
Iyi modoka igendeshwa n’ingufu zikomoka ku mirasire y’izuba ziba zabitswe mu byitwa batiri (batterie/battery) bibiri, zaba zuzuye n
... (1677 chars skipped) ... 

Nzitonda umuyobozi wa STES-Rwanda ati “Iyi modoka iruzuye, iri gukorwaho imirimo ya nyuma ngo inoge neza ubundi tuyimurikire inzego z’ubushakashatsi n’ubuziranenge yemerwe nk’iyakorerwa mu gutwara ibintu n’abantu ku buryo bwemewe.
Imirimo ya nyuma yo kuyinoza neza nirangira tuzaganira n’abandi tuyishakire n’izina, imodoka Nyarwanda itwarwa n’imirasire y’izuba tuyishyire ku isoko ubishaka wese ayigure ajye ayikoresha mu ngendo ze.”
Iyi modoka yakozwe hifashishijwe ibyuma biboneka mu Rwanda n’ubw
... (1677 chars skipped) ...
modoka zarakozwe ntimute igihe cyanyu, uwo muyobozi ntakomeze kubashuka.
Ariko uyu muyobozi arabona ibyo avuga bishoboka koko ? Mwa bana mwe nareke kubatesha igihe, muhimbe ibintu biri practical. Arabashuka ntaho iyo modoka ishobora kugera !!!! Mumenye ko mutari abambere babigerageje ariko ntiyigeze ijya mumuhanda. Utwo dufaranga yashoyemo twashoboraga kubafasha mubindi. NAREKE KUBATERA IGIHE !!!
made in Rwanda iraje kbs nidenge tuzayikora bakomereze aho
bakoze imodoka cyangwa bateranije pieces?

Ingaruka Mbi Zo Gutinda Gukora Imibonano Mpuzabitsina
Ushobora kuzakora imibonano mpuzabitsina numara gushaka. Icitonderwa : Ino nkuru ntiwemerewe kuyisoma utarengeje imyaka 18 1 ) Ashuhirwa buri kanya bitewe n’utuntu tutunvikana 2) Ubushakashatsi bwakozwe n. Urubuga rwa interineti: food-nutrition. Ubusambanyi nabwo bwahawe andi mazina yo kubupfobya babwita gukora urukundo,gushimishanya,kurya avanse,kurya umwana,kugera ku ngingo,kutaba umurezi… Muri iyi ngingo tugiye kuvuga ku buryo bumwe na bum
... (35859 chars skipped) ... 
ngwa n'uko ibi bimutera ibikomere muri we. ingaruka mbi zo kureba amashusho y' ibyo ubusambanyi, imibonano mpuzabitsina baheranwa n' ibitekerezo bakagira amanota,. Ingaruka mbi buri mukobwa-umusore ushaka gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina imburagihe agomba kubanza gutekerezaho Umuntu wese wishora mu gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina yibye(atarabiherwa uburenganzira) agomba kumenya ko harimo umunyenga ariko ukurikirwa n’ingaruka mbi nyinshi. Uko nasweye umukobwa mu biro. Mu gihe uryamye amasaha menshi, b
... (35859 chars skipped) ...
i. Ubukene bw'umubyeyi bugira ingaruka mbi kumwana akiri munda yanyina-ubushakashatsi. Abagabo twagiye duha uyu muti benshi bagarutse kudushimira kuko ahanini bazaga ingo zabo zirimo ibibazo kubera kugira ubushake buke mu gihe cy ' imibonano mpuzabitsina , kurangiza vuba, gutinda kongera kugira ubushake n ' ibindi bibazo binyuranye. Video zo Guswera Zitandukanye. Iyo uganiriye n'abantu batandukanye, bakubwira ko umuryango wibasiwe cyane ndetse hari ababifata nk'icyorezo bitewe n'ubwinshi bwabyo.

Ibi ni ibisobanurwa n'umushakashatsi Gabriel Frobose wananditse igitabo kuri iyi ngingo.
Avuga ko mu byuya ariho haboneka umusemburo witwa feromone (pheromone), ngo waba ukurura abantu bafite ibintu runaka bahuje. Gihamya atanga ni nk'abakobwa bakunda kwambara imyambaro y'abasore b'inshuti zabo, cyangwa abagore bambara imyambaro y'abagabo babo.
Muri kiriya gitabo kandi, Madame Frobose atanga urugero nanone kuri Napoleon Bonaparte, umwami w'abami w'U Bufaransa, wigeze kwandikira umukunzi we Josephine urwandiko aho yagiraga ati:" Uramenye ube uretse gukaraba ntaraza; dore nzagaruka mu minsi 3!".
N'ubwo bwose bimeze bityo ariko, ni ngombwa kugira igaruriro, hakirindwa ibyuya birimo umwanda.

Mu kiganiro kihariye yanyujije ku rukuta rwe rwa YouTube atangira avuga ko atari azi neza igihe Michael azamwambikira impeta nubwo yari abizi ati'Narimbizi ko ashobora kubikora ariko mu kuri sinarinzi igihe icyaricyo.'
Agaragaza ko ubwo byabaga we atabyumvaga ariko uko iminsi igenda arushaho kugenda aryoherwa nabyo ati'Abantu bakomezaga baturata amashimwe nkababwira ngo murakoze ariko nkumva hari ukuntu natangara cyane. Ariko mu kuri ntabwo mbyumva uko iminsi igenda niko ngenda ndushaho kubyumva
... (172 chars skipped) ... 
di sindi umuntu ukunda ibintu by'udushya.'
Amubwira uko yamusobanuriye ati'Ndashaka guhura na Papa wawe nshaka kumubwira ku mishinga yanjye y'ubucuruzi.'
Uburyo Miss Naomie yahuje fiancé we Michael na Se ati'Nandikira Papa ubundi ni umugabo ucisha make nigeze menya mwiza kandi utuje turi inshuti magara mubwira buri kimwe aranyumva ndamubwira araza batangira kuganira.'
Agaragaza ko yabonaga imyitwarire ya Michael hari ukuntu yahindutsemo ubwo ariko Naomie yaje kugera aho igikorwa cyabereye asanga
... (172 chars skipped) ...
e wo kwambikwa impeta akomoza ku buryo byari ibyishimo muri Zanzibar aho bagiye mu biruhuko by'isabukuru.
Ku wa 05 Mutarama akaba aribwo Miss Naomie yizihiza isabukuru y'amavuko naho umukunzi we akayizihiza kuwa 20 Mutarama.Michael yavuze ko uko iminsi yicuma aribwo arushaho kumva ibinezaneza byo kuba yarambitswe impeta Yagarutse ku buryo Michael yishimira ko amwita fiance kuva yamwambika impetaMiss Noamie yagarutse ku buryo Se umubyara yahuye na Michael ku munsi uyu musore yamwambikiyeho impeta

Umusomyi wa Taarifa yatwandikiye agira ngo dutambutse inyandiko ye yanditse agira abahanzi Ariel Wayz na Juno Kizigenza inama mu rukundo rwabo rumaze iminsi ruhwihwiswa.
Mu nyandiko ye yatubwiye ati: “
‘Nitwa Amiela ntuye mu Murenge wa Kicukiro mu Karere ka Kicukiro mu Mujyi wa Kigali. Nubwo ndi umubyeyi ariko nkurikirana umuziki w’Abanyarwanda baba abo hambere n’ab’ubu. Mfite abana bato ariko nabo bakunda umuziki n’ubwo batarasobanukirwa cyane n’ibibera kuri iyi si dutuye.
Mperutse kubona indir
... (295 chars skipped) ... 
sigaye ni uko begera ababyeyi babo bakabibabwira bakabimenya byaba byiza bagashakana kandi tuzabutaha turi benshi.
Yaba Juno yaba na Ariel bagomba kwibuka ko ‘uwo uzaheka utamwicisha urume’.
Niba bakundana kandi bakaba bifuza kuzubaka urugo nibabikore bive mu nzira ejo icyo bita urukundo muri iki gihe kitazacwekera bikaba byatuma abafana babo babafata nk’abantu b’inkomwahato, abo njya numva bita ngo ‘runaka ntabwo ari serious.’
Ntimwibwire ko muri bato k’uburyo mutakubaka urugo ngo rukomere kuko
... (295 chars skipped) ...
i ndagaruka cyane kuri Ariel Wayz. Uri umukobwa mwiza kandi ufite impano rwose. Bwira Juno mushakane niba mukundana koko, muzabyara muheke kandi mukomeze umuziki wanyu.
Ntabwo bizakubuza kuririmba neza no kuba umubyeyi wizihiye u Rwanda. Juno nawe azaba ari umugabo uhamye wubatse urugo rwe, mbese ari Kizigenza koko.
Bana banjye rero iyi ni inama mbahaye nk’umubyeyi kandi ndizera ko hari abandi bafana banyu babibona nkanjye.
Imana ikomeze ibarindire mu rukundo rwanyu ni mu muziki wanyu, mwaguke.’

Babivugira ko ngo hari bamwe mu bashinzwe gucunga amafaranga abaturage bashyiraho bakayirira aho kuyageza muri Mituweri.
Mu nama y’Inteko Rusange y’Umuryango FPR-Inkotanyi mu Karere ka Nyaruguru yateranye ku wa 28 Kanama 2016, Umuyobozi wayo mu karere, Francois Habitegeko, akaba yasabye abanyamuryango mu kubikurikirana.
Yagize ati ”Ndasaba rwose abayobozi b’umuryango ku nzego zitandukanye, ibi bimina na byo tubigiremo uruhare, cyane cyane tureba uburyo bicunzwe.”
Asaba abanyamuryango ba FPR-Inko
... (202 chars skipped) ... 
indi ni ukugira uruhare mu gukurikirana amafaranga yanyerejwe akagaruzwa, kuko hari aho byagiye bigaragara ko abantu bagiye bayakoresha nabi kandi tugakumira ko byakongera kubaho”.
Nubwo ubuyobozi bw’umuryango nta kimina bwigeze butunga urutoki kuba gikora nabi, hari bamwe mu banyamuryango biyemerera ko mu bimina hagiye habaho kunyereza amafaranga.
Rumwe mu ngero batanga ni mu Mudugudu wa Bukinga, Akagari ka Shororo ho mu Murenge wa Busanze.
Nzirumbanje Innocent, Umukuru w’uwo mudugudu, agira at
... (202 chars skipped) ...
gire mibi muri ibi bimina ngo bahise babihagurukira, ku buryo ubu hari aho byatangiye gukosoka.
Jean Bosco Kabanda, wo mu Murenge wa Cyahinda, agira ati ”Ibyo bintu twarabikosoye, ubu amafaranga abaturage barayatanga tugahita tuyohereza muri RSSB ako kanya, umuturage wujuje imisanzu agahita ahabwa mituweri agatangira kwivuza”.
ark ngo nyakubahwa yavuzeko umuntu ufite amafaranga ,ajye yishyura atarindiriye abumuryango bose.?
Strict laws should be set for those who misuse money for health services

LEHO icukumbura ihujwe ituma imigozi yawe ya excavator ifite ubushobozi bwo guhindukirira ako kanya ishobora guhindagurika rwose dogere 90 kumpande zombi.Nibindi byinjira cyane kugirango ugereranye na silinderi ihengamye, swing iroroshye.
Iyo imirimo yo gucukura ibaye ingorabahizi kandi ntibishoboka gucukura intoki, guhuza kugororoka birashobora guha moteri yawe ibintu byinshi: guhura nimpande zikomeye, nta mpamvu yo guhora usimbuza moteri cyangwa ibyago byo guta imashini.Leho guhindagurika byihuse nuburyo bwiza cyane bwo guhindura indobo yawe ihari cyangwa izindi mugereka mubikoresho bigoramye.

Muri Nijeriya, umupfakazi yavuze uburyo umuhungu we w’imyaka 17 yateye inda bashiki be bombi.
Iyi nkuru yamenyekanye binyuze ku muntu ukoresha urubugu rwa twitter nyuma yuko umugore yohereje kuri DM (Ubutumwa butaziguye) maze asaba ko yagirwa inama y’ibyo yahuye nabyo mu muryango we.
Inkuru dukesha Faceofmalawi,mu butumwa bwe agisha inama,uwo mupfakazi Yagize ati”Ndi umukecuru w’imyaka 52 y’amavuko nkaba umupfakazi na mama wabana batatu umuhungu wimyaka 17 n’abakobwa babiri umwe ufite imyaka 15 
... (568 chars skipped) ... 
abana, mbakurikiranira hafi ariko uyu munsi numijwe n’ibyababayeho.
Buri kwezi nsuzuma ko abakobwa banjye bameze neza, kuko umukuru muri bo akunze kurwara igifu kuko adafite ubuzima bwiza kandi ahanini nkabana nibi buri iteka ryose.
Ariko ikintu kidasanzwe,muri Mata ntacyo yerekanaga, ahubwo nabonye ibimenyetso bya mbere byo gutwita, nuko musaba kunkusanyiriza inkari zimwe na zimwe maze ejo mu gitondo, hanyuma ndamupima bigaragara ko aribyo.
Ntabwo namubwiye byinshi,ubwo nimugoroba nasubiye mu c
... (568 chars skipped) ...
a ava mu rugo mu ijoro ryakeye kandi sinigeze mubwira nabi.
Nkeneyeinama zanyu rwose, ndumiwe, ndabona inzozi zanjye zangiritse nyuma y’imyaka myinshi yo kwiyegurira Imana.
Umugabo wanjye yapfuye mu 2009 kuva ubwo nshinzwe byose.
Sinzi icyo gukora, ndashaka kubona abana banjye bakurira hamwe bakaba abantu nshinzwe.Gusa bitewe n’ibiri kumbaho, nta mbaraga nsigara muri njye.
Natekereje gukuramo izo nda zose ariko ndi umwizera kandi kwizera kwanjye ntikubinyemerera.
Mugire inama y’uko yabyitwaramo.

Muhanga: Kuba nta ngamba zihamye zashyizwe mu bworozi bizagora kwesa imihigo y’akarere
Kuri uyu wa 9 Mutarama 2012, mu gikorwa cyateguwe na leta y’u Rwanda cyo kureba aho imihigo igeze ishyirwa mu bikorwa, umuyobozi w’akarere ka Muhanga na bamwe mu bo bafatanije kuyobora akarere batangaje ko kuba nta gahunda ihamye yashyizwe mu bworozi bibabangamira mu kwesa imihigo biyemeje kugeraho.
“Mu bworozi nta ngamba zihari zifatika nibyo byatumye ishyirwa mu bikorwa ry’uyu muhigo riri hasi cyane,†aya ni 
... (677 chars skipped) ... 
aturutse ku mikorere mibi y’akarere abereye umuyobozi ahubwo ngo byaturutse ku mikorere y’ikigo cy’igihugu cyita ku buhinzi RAB kuko ari cyo cyagombaga kubaha izi ntanga ndetse n’imisemburo irindisha inka, nyuma bakaza kubwirwa ko ntabyo bazashobora kubona nk’uko babyijejwe.
Aha abakozi b’iri tsinda rya leta bakaba bababajije icyatumye bemera gusinya imihigo batabanje kureba neza ibibazo bazahuriramo nabyo kugeza ubwo ivutsemo ikibazo nk’iki.
Ku ruhande rw’akarere, Mutakwasuku avuga ko hari kens
... (677 chars skipped) ...
nka zigera ku 150 ubuyobozi bwemeye ko buzaha abaturage ariko ntibyakorwa kuko hari amabwiriza bavuga ko “asa n’aho agoye†kuko babwiwe ko inka bazazana zigomba kumara iminsi 10 ziri mu maboko y’akarere kugira ngo zipimwe amaraso kandi nta bushobozi akarere gafite bwo kuzizanira ndetse no kuba bazitunze muri iyo minsi.
Banavuga ko hashobora kuzavuka ikibazo cya ba rwiyemezamirimo bashobora kwanga aya mabwiriza yo kubanza gusuzuma inka zabo kuko baba bumva ko zishobora kwangwa bakaba bazisubizayo.

Abanyeshuri basaga 100 babuze impamyabumenyi zabo, hari mu muhango wo kuzitanga ku abarangije muri kaminuza ya Kigali (Uok), ubuyobozi bw’iyi kaminuza bukavuga ko batujuje ibisabwa.
Ibi byabaye kuri uyu wa gatanu tariki ya 10 Werurwe 2017 Ubwo iyi kaminuza yatangaga impamyabumenyi ku inshuro yayo ya kabiri.
Abanyeshuri basaga 100 nibo bahuye ni iki kibazo. Ubuyobozi bwo buvuga ko abanyeshuri babuze impamyabumenyi zabo ari abatujuje ibisabwa byose by’ishuli.
Umwe mu baharangije waganiriye na Kiga
... (164 chars skipped) ... 
 yo mashuri yisumbuye yabuze.
Agira ati “Barambwira ngo sinatanze impamyabumenyi yanjye y’ayisumbuye kandi mfite aho bansinyiye ko bayakiriye! Ubu ni uburangare bukabije bwa kaminuza. Kuki nibura batabitubwiye mbere ngo ntitwirirwe tuza, ndababaye cyane.”
Mugenzi we aragira ati “Jye ko nta kibazo mfitanye n’ikigo, amafaranga yabo narayishyuye yose, sinumva ukuntu mbura impamyabushobozi yanjye ku munota wanyuma.”
Umubyeyi wari waherekeje umwana n’agahinda kenshi ati “Kubona umwana yiga imyaka ita
... (164 chars skipped) ...
rezi, ushinzwe amashuri abanza n’ayisumbuye avuga ko umunyeshuri wize akarangiza nta cyatuma atabona impamyabumenyi ye.
Agira ati “Uruhare rwacu nka Minisiteri y’Uburezi ni ugufasha za Kaminuza kwigisha abana bakarangiza neza.Aba rero bahuye n’ibi bibazo ni kaminuza igomba kubikemura kuko umwana wize akarangiza agomba kubona impamyabumenyi.”
Abagera kuri 544 bahawe impamyabumenyi zabo baranazishimirwa, mu igihe abandi batashye barira inzira yose babuze umusaruro w’ibyo babibye imyaka itatu yose.

Inkoko itekanye na moutarde
Ibikoresho :
Inkoko
Amavuta ibiyiko 3 binini
Igitunguru 1 kinini cy’umutuku
Maggi 1
Chicken Masala
Moutarde ibiyiko 2 binini
Uko itegurwa :
Kata inkoko uyikatemo ibice 8-12
Yitogose
Kuramo amazi uyashyire ku ruhande
Shyira amavuta mu yindi safuriya uyikarange
Shyiramo ibiunguru
Bitarashya shyiramo na maggi, chiken masala, na moutarde bishyane
Gabanya umuriro bishye neza, niba ushaka ko byoroha wakongeramo amazi make kuri yayandi watogoshejemo inkoko.

Imyiteguro y'igitaramo East Africa Gospel concert cya TONZI iri kugenda neza
Yashyizweho na: Editor - Kuwa:27/10/2012Ubwo twamusuraga mu rugo, umuhanzi Tonzi uri gutegura igitaramo ngarukamwaka yise « East Africa Gospel concert » kizabera kuri Serena Hotel, ku cyumweru tariki ya 4/11/2012 yadutangarijeko ibintu byose biri kugenda neza.
Tonzi imyiteguro ayigeze kure
Aho mu rugo tukaba twasanze ari mu mwitozo we n’abacuranzi be, ibi bikaba bikorwa gatatu mu cyumweru rimwe na rimwe bagakora imwitoz
... (288 chars skipped) ... 
mwe na Bishop Murili kuva Nairobi muri Kenya bose bakazafatanya na Tonzi muri kino gitaramo.
Ubwo twamubazaga akarusho kino gitarmo gifite ugereranyije nibindi bitaramo dore ko Tonzi azwiho gukora ibintu bishya mu bitaramo bye ategura, yatubwiyeko hazaba umwanya uhagije kuri buri muhanzi akisanzura, akaba ariyo mpamvu azakorana n’abahanzi bakeya dore ko mu Rwanda ari we n’itsinda The Blessing ribyira uburyo bugezweho bazakigaragaramo gusa naho abandi ni abahanzi bo hanze kuko nabo Tonzi yifuzako
... (288 chars skipped) ...
guye
Iki gitaramo kizacurangwa Live
Reka tubibutse ko Tonzi ari umwe mu bahanzi bakomeye ba gospel bagize uruhare mu gukundisha uwo muziki wa gospel abanyarwanda, dore ko yatangiye kuririmba kuva kera aho yagiye anyura mu ma Korale menshi atandukanye n’amatsinda yo kuririmba ku rusenegro no ku bigo by’amashuri yizemo, nyuma atangira kuririrmba ku giti cye wenyine,akaba kugeza ubu afite alubumu 2 z’amajwi n’imwe y’amashusho, « Humura » akaba ariyo ndirimbo yamenyekanyeho cyane.

Muri iki gihe, abajura bahinduye umuvuno, bakajije umurego mu butekamutwe by’umwihariko ubukorwa hifashishijwe telefoni.
Akenshi usanga muri ibi bikorwa, umuntu ahamagara undi bikarangira amubwiye ibintu bituma amutwara amafaranga ye, mu buryo atazi cyangwa bitewe no kuba atagize amakenga.
Umuvugizi w’Urwego rw’Igihugu rw’Ubugenzacyaha, RIB, Dr Murangira B. Thierry, yifashishije imibare yabwiye IGIHE ko ubu butekamutwe bugenda bwiyongera ndetse bikaba bigaragarira mu birego bitangwa.
Yagize ati 
... (2026 chars skipped) ... 
yangwa uburyo zibonekamo; guhabwa nimero nshya mu gihe indi yibwe; gufunguza konti muri banki mu buryo bw’iyakure n’amakuru y’abantu yandagaye aho usanga imyirondoro y’abantu ishobora kuboneka byoroshye, ukaba wabaruza nimero ya telefone ku indangamuntu y’undi muntu ukajya uyifashisha ukora ibyaha.
Dr. Murangira yavuze ko hari ibikwiye gukorwa n’ibigo by’itumanaho kugira ngo ubujura bucogozwe.

AMATEGEKO AGENGA IYANDIKA RY'IGITEKEREZO CYAWE
Witandukira kubijyanye n'iyi nkuru; wikwandika ibisebanya, ibyamamaza cyangwa bivangura; wikwandika ibiteye isoni, Wifuza kubona byihuse ibivugwa/ibisubizo ku gitekerezo cyawe, andika email yawe ahabugenewe. Ibi bidakurikijwe igitekerezo cyanyu gishobora kutagaragara hano cyangwa kigasibwa.
Igitekerezo cyawe kigaragara nyuma y'isuzuma rikorwa na IGIHE.com , Murakoze!

Rulindo: hafashwe ingamba mu kubungabunga umutekano.
Kuri uyu wa mbere tariki ya 21/4/2014, mu murenge wa Shyorongi ho mu karere ka Rulindo hateraniye inama yaguye y’akarere, inama yari igamije kunoza ingamba zidasanzwe mu kubungabunga umutekano w’aka karere n’uw’igihugu cyose muri rusange.
Iyi nama ikaba yari yitabiriwe na bamwe mu bakozi b’akarere, abayobozi b’imirenge, umuyobozi wa Polisi mu karere ka Rulindo supertendent Musangwa Marc  n’umuyobozi w’ingabo muri Brigade ya 408 jean damascene 
... (364 chars skipped) ... 
 yabo no kumenya uburyo babana mu rwego rwo kudaha urwaho uwaba ashaka guhungabanya umutekano anyuze mu bayobozi nk’uko bimaze iminsi bivugwa muri iyi ntara y’amajyaruru.
Muri iyi nama hagarutswe ku bayobozi biga mu bihugu by’ibituranya bya RDC na Uganda,  yababwiye abayobozi ko nta muyobozi wemerewe kwiga muri ibi bihugu, kandi ko n’abaturage babyigamo hagomba kumenyekana koko niba baba bagiye kwiga, cyangwa nta bindi bikorwa byo guhungabanya umutekano baba bagiyemo.
Abayobozi mu nzego z’ibanze
... (364 chars skipped) ...
girira akamaro.
Urugero rwatanzwe ni nk’aho hari bamwe mu bakozi bakora mu bucukuzi bw’amabuye y’agaciro bahemberwa mu ntoki, kandi bagahemberwa imbere y’utubari aho byagaragajwe ko hari  bamwe bayasiga aho.

Melchor yongeyeho ati “Ibitunguru ni ingenzi cyane ku mafunguro ya gakondo. Igihe cyose utetse hano ugomba kugishyiramo. Ni ikirungo cy’ingenzi cyane mu mafunguro ya Gifilipine.”

Nyuma y’imyaka ine bakora, itsinda rya TNP bafite gahunda yo guhindura imikorere yabo bagashyiramo imbaraga ndetse bagashyikiriza abakunzi ibihangano byinshi bigizwe n’amashusho ari ku rwego mpuza mahanga.
Baganira na IGIHE, TNP batangaje ko bakomeje kugira imbogamizi z’amasomo cyane cyane ko umwe muri bo ‘Tracy’ yari akiga mu mashuri yisumbuye , Nicolas ari mu mahanga ndetse na Passy amasomo ya kaminuza atamworoheye.
Gusa ngo bisa nk’aho biri gukemuka kuko Tracy yarangije amashuri yisumbuye, Nicolas akagaruka mu Rwanda ndetse na Paccy nawe akaba ari mu mwaka wa nyuma wa Kaminuza, bityo bakaba bagiye guha umwanya umuziki kuko ari umwuga wabo kandi bawukunda.
Kugeza ubu TNP bamaze gushyira hanze Indirimbo 12 zizaba ziri kuri album yabo ya mbere bateganya kumurika uyu mwaka. Izaba igizwe n’indirimbo 14.
Aba basore kandi bamaze no gushyira hanze amashusho y’indirimbo ‘Ndamubonye’ bakoreye muri Uganda. Nk’uko aya mashusho abigaragaza, itsinda TNP ryabashije gukora amashusho meza kandi agezweho.
Aba basore kandi bavuga ko bagiye kuzajya bakora indirimbo bagahita basohora n’amashusho yayo mu rwego rwo kunezeza amafana ababo bihagije.
TNP yagiye imenyeka mu ndirimbo zabo zakunzwe nka ‘Kamucerenge’, ‘Ndamburiraho ibiganza’ bakoranye na Knowless n’izindi.

Umugabo w’umunyamisiri witwa Ramadhan yaratunguwe ubwo ku nshuro ye ya mbere yarebye filime y’urukozasoni yasanze umukinnyi mukuru wayo ari umugore we.
Ramadhan yarebeye iyi filime muri cyber café ubwo yakururwaga n’imiterere yabonaga k’umukobwa wagaragaraga ku mashusho ayitangiza, gusa yaje kureba neza asanga uwo mukobwa ari umugore we babana. Akimara kubona ko ari umugore we yahise yitura hasi, ariko nyuma yaho gato aza kuzanzamuka maze ahita ajya mu rugo iwe vuba n’umujinya, ahageze atangira gutonganya umugore we. Ariko umugore we acisha make, maze aramworoshya bahita bajyana muri iyo cyber café kureba iyo filime, ayimweretse asanga niwe koko, maze nyamugore nta kuzuyaza amwemerera ko ariwe.
Nyamugore ariko yamubwiye ko atamuciye inyuma, kuko ngo nubwo bamaranye imyaka 16 bakaba banafitanye abana 4, iyo filime ari amashusho ya kera yafashwe ubwo yari kumwe n’umukunzi we wo mu bwana yakundaga byo gupfa. Ngo ndetse kugeza n’ubu agifitiye urukundo. Ramadhan nyuma yaho kandi akaba ngo yaraje kubona andi mashusho 12 y’urukozasoni kuri interineti, amashusho y’umugore we n’uwo musore. Gusa kugeza ubu ngo bakaba batarafata icyemezo cyo gutana cyangwa kugumana.

Ibi byateguwe n’umuryango wu urubyiruko rwa Zion Temple Gisozi aho batumiye abigisha batandukanye muri iki kiganiro mpaka bazaba baganira nabazitabira bityo bakabasha kwigisha kumenya ibyagaciro umuntu afite byagirira abandi akamaro ndetse n’uburyo yabikoresha.
Inyungu bifitiye urubyiruko nuko bazabasha kumenya byinshi umuntu aba afite muriwe ariko atazi ko iri ibyakamaro aho hazaba hari abantu batandukanye basangiza urubyiruko experience yabo ndetse nuburyo bakoresha ibyo batunze bityo bikabasha kugirira abandi akamaro.
Biteganyijwe ko bizaba kuri iki cyumweru taliki ya 11/09/2016 kuri Zion Temple Gisozi kuva isaha ya saah 13h00, Bamwe mu bazaganiriza urubyiruko harimo umuyobozi wa Zion Temple Gisozi Pastor Mukeza Cameron na Fifi Cameron ndetse nabandi bazaba baturutse ahandi nka Pastor Habimana Didier wo muri Zion Temple Kimironko, Pastor Kabanda Juliennewo muri Jubile Revival Church, Evangeliste Serge Mushinzimana ndetse na Evangeliste Nzabakira Flory Umuyobozi wa Radio na Television Authentic.
Uretse ibi kandi hazaba higishwa n’uburyo impano y’umuntu ishobora kurerwa ndetse ikagirira n’abandi umumaro, iyo umaze kumenya icyo ufite nibwo nibwo ushobora gufasha abandi.

Kuri uyu wa 14 Gashyantare 2020 abenshi bari bambariye igitaramo Kassav’ yakoreye muri Kigali Convention Centre yahuriyemo na Christopher, uri mu bahanzi bakomeye mu Rwanda baririmba indirimbo ziganjemo iz’urukundo.
Bamwe batashye bimyiza imoso! Byageze saa tatu abantu bamaze kuzura mu cyumba cyari kuberamo iki gitaramo, bamwe basubizwa inyuma babwirwa ko imyanya yamaze gushira.

... (580 chars skipped) ... 
 buri wese yavuye mu byimbo ari gucinya akadiho, abandi bafata amafoto n’amashusho bagaragaza ko bishimiye iki gitaramo.
Mu myaka 41 imaze, Kassav’ ni ubwa kabiri yari ikoreye igitaramo mu Rwanda, ndetse uretse abanyarwanda bari bayitegerezanyije amatsiko, na yo ubwayo yifuzaga kongera gufata amafu y’i Kigali no gutaramira abihebeye indirimbo zayo.
Iri tsinda ryaherukaga mu Rwanda tariki 31 Nyakanga 2010 mu gitaramo cyasozaga iserukiramuco rya FESPAD, ryabaga ku nshuro ya karindwi. Ryageze i Kig
... (580 chars skipped) ...
ho, mu gihe abandi byari ukugura inshya ku 20 000 Frw. Hari n’abantu 100 basubijwe ayo bari baguze amatike.
Iri tsinda ryatangirijwe muri Guadeloupe mu Bufaransa. Izina Kassav’ rizwi guhera mu 1979, rifite ubuhanga mu njyana ya Zouk. Imyaka 41 irashize rikunzwe bikomeye ndetse ibihangano byaryo binyura ab’ingeri zose, ntibajya babihararukwa.
Kassav’ uretse gutaramira mu Rwanda, iri mu rugendo rwerekeza muri RDC aho izitabira iserukiramuco yatumiwemo.

Yakomeje agira ati: “Mwarahuguwe, amahugurwa yari amagambo ariko mugiye kubishyira mu bikorwa kandi mu bikorwa ni ho muzagaragarira. Murasabwa gukomeza gu

Bidatinze, Minisitiri w’Intebe, Anastase Murekezi yatangiye kuvuga uko uturere twahiganye mu kwesa imihigo, ku isonga haseruka Gasabo n’amanota 81.6%.
Aka karere katunguye benshi kuva ku mwanya wa 28 mu mwaka wa 2013/2014, n’uwa 8 mu mwaka wa 2014/2015 kakagera ku mwanya wa Mbere mu mwaka wa 2015/2016.
Umuyobozi w’Akarere ka Gasabo, Stephen Rwamurangwa, avuga ko ibanga ryatumye bagera kuri iyi ntambwe bagahigika uturere twose, ari imikoranire y’inzego no guha ijambo abaturage mu bibakorerwa.

Uturere dutanu twa mbere ni Gasabo, Gicumbi, Huye, Rusizi, Nyamagabe. Uturere twa Kayonza, Gakenke, Nyagatare, Rutsiro, Musanze twaje mu myanya itanu ya nyuma.
Intara y’Amajyepfo ifite uturere dutanu mu icumi twa mbere, naho Uburengerazuba bukagira uturere tune mu icumi twa nyuma.

Mu nama igamije kureba icyakorwa kugira ngo inyamaswa ziri mu gasozi zirusheho kwitabwaho yabaye muri Kanama 2017, RDB yatangaje ko hari ibiri gukorwa ngo ingagi ziri muri Pariki y’Ibirunga zibone ubwisanzure.
Ibarura ryakozwe mu 2010 ryagaragaje ko mu Birunga hari ingagi 480 zivuye kuri 285 zari zihari mu 1978. Muri izo ngagi, 65 % ziba mu Rwanda. Kuva mu 2003 kugeza mu 2010, ingagi zo mu birunga ziyongereye ku kigero cya 26.3 %.

ihugu y’Ibirunga, batazirengagiza abaturage bayituriye.

Nyirakuru wa The Ben yatabarutse mu masaha ya mu gitondo cyo kuri uyu wa Kane tariki 28 Werurwe 2024 ari mu nzira ajyanwa kwa muganga.
Nyirakuru wa The Ben witwa Mukangarambe Yunia yari umukecuru ukuze ariko ufite imbaraga nk’uko IGIHE babyanditse.Umwe mubo abereye nyirakuru yagize ati:”Nyogokuru yatabarutse mu gitondo nka Saa Kumi n’Imwe.Yaguye mu nzira bamujyanye kwa muganga.Yari amaze amezi 2 arwaye ariko ntabwo yigeze aremba yari afite imbaraga”.
Mukangarambe Yunia nyirakuru wa The Ben ubyara nyina.Abitabiriye ubukwe bwa The Ben na Pamella bibuka ifoto y’uyu mubyeyi abari hagati bateruye impano bombi bamugeneye.Yari atuye i Kayonza mu Ntara y’Iburasirazuba.

Uyu mukinnyi w’imyaka 19 yatoranyijwe na LA Lakers muri Kamena 2024, cyane ko yari asoje umwaka we wa mbere mu mikino ya kaminuza akinira Trojans iherereye mu majyepfo ya California.
Nyuma yo gutoranywa kwe hari abatangiye gushidikanya ku rwego rwe, bavuga ko nubwo ari umukinnyi mwiza ariko atari yakageza igihe cyo guhatana mu Irushanwa rikomeye nka NBA.
Nk’uko The Athletic yabyanditse, LA Lakers iri gutekereza uko yamwohereza mu irushanwa ryo hasi (G League) mu ntangiriro z’umwaka w’imikino ndetse akaba yakina muri South Bay Lakers.
Umwaka ushize wari mwiza kuri Bronny James ariko ntiwamworohera kuko yagizemo ikibazo cy’umutima cyatumye amara igihe adakina.
LeBron James w’imyaka 39, mu 2022 ubwo yakinaga umukino w’intoranywa yaciye amarenga ko uyu mwaka uzaba ari uwa nyuma ari mu kibuga, bityo yifuza yifuza kuzakinana n’umuhungu we.

Karongi: Ikigega cy’ubuhunikiro bubakiwe kizabafasha guhunika umusaruro w’ubuhinzi
Yanditswe na DUSINGIZUMUREMYI VESTINE
Ubuyobozi bw’Umurenge wa Ruganda mu karere ka Karongi, buravuga ko ikigega cy’ubuhunikiro abaturage bubakiwe, kizabafasha kwirinda gusesagura umusaruro, mu rwego rwo guteganyiriza ejo hazaza.
Iki kigega cy’ubuhunikiro cyubatswe mu kagari ka Kabingo mu murenge wa Ruganda, gifite ubushobozi bwo guhunika toni ziri hagati ya 2000 na 2500 z’ibishyimbo n’ibigori, cyuzuye gitwaye ama
... (581 chars skipped) ... 
ro bongere bawugurishe, ibyo bizafasha abanyaruganda guhahira ku mafaranga makeya”.
Biteganyijwe ko imyaka izajya yera abaturage bakayigurisha kuri iyo koperative, nitangira kuba mike ku isoko bongere bayigure kuri bwa buhunikiro ku mafaranga asumbye ayo bayitanzeho, ariko na none atangana n’ari ku isoko ryo hanze.
Gitifu Mwumvaneza yakomeje agira ati “Iki kigega nta bwo kizabura ibyo duhunika kuko tweza ibishyimbo n’ibigori kandi tumaze kugira amaterasi menshi, gusa nta bwo twari twasarura kuko
... (581 chars skipped) ...
ro numara kwera”.
Hitimana Salomo, umwe mu baturage avuga ko ubu buhunikiro buzabafasha kujya bagurira imbuto hafi batagombye gusiragira.
Ati:“Ubu buhunikiro buzadufasha gukusanya umusaruro uzava mu materasi turi gukorerwa twongere tuwugure hafi utanyagiwe utanamunzwe”.
Umuyobozi w’Akarere ka Karongi wungirijwe ushinzwe iterambere ry’ubukungu, Bagwire Esperence, avuga ko iyi nyubako y’ubuhunikiro ije ari igisubizo mu gufasha abaturage kwizigamira no guhangana n’ihindagurika ry’ibiciro ku masoko.

Nyamasheke: Imyiteguro yo kwibuka ku nshuro ya 18 iri kugenda neza.
Kuva ku itariki ya 7 Mata buri mwaka, mu gihugu hose hatangira iminsi ijana yo kwibuka inzirakarengane zazize jenoside yakorewe abatutsi mu 1994. Insanganyamatsiko y’uyu mwaka igira iti:â€KWIBUKA GENOCIDE YAKOREWE ABATUTSI: TWIGIRE KU MATEKA, TWUBAKA EJO HAZAZA HEZA.â€
Nk’uko raporo y’imyiteguro y’igihe cyo kwibuka mu karere ka Nyamasheke ibyerekana, ngo imyiteguro igeze ku rugero rushimishije ku bufatanye bw’inzego zose n’abaturage; n’ibindi bigo byihariye bikaba byaramaze gutegura gahunda yo kwibuka abahoze ari abakozi babyo bazize ayo amahano.
Muri iki gihe cy’iminsi 100, mu Karere ka Nyamasheke hazashyingurwa imibiri yatahuwe hirya no hino mu Mirenge itandukanye, ikazashyingurwa mu cyubahiro ku matariki atandukanye.
Iyi raporo kandi ikomeza ivuga ko hari indi mibiri yatahuwe mu mirenge ya Kilimbi na Mahembe ikaba izashyingurwa hamwe n’imibiri igera ku bihumbi 25 izimurwa aho yari ishyinguwe ku kigo cy’ishuri rya Nyakanyinya igashyingurwa mu Rwibutso rushya ruri kwubakwa mu murenge wa Gihombo, ahahoze ari Komini ya Rwamatamu. Iki gikorwa kikazaba ku wa 24 Kamena 2012.
Muri iki gihe cyo kwitegura kwibuka ku nshuro ya 18, ubuyobozi bw’akarere buri gushyira imbaraga mu gushishikariza abaturage kwitabira gahunda zo kwibuka hagamijwe gufata mu mugongo abatakaje ababo muri jenoside babaremera, kugira ngo mu bufatanye iterambere rirambye rizagerweho, hubakwa ejo hazaza heza.

Ambassadors of Christ yo mu Itorero ry’Abadivantisiti b’umunsi wa karindwi, barishimira imyaka itatu, Umuyobozi wayo Manzi Nelson na Irakiza Eunice bamaze bakoze ubukwe.
Ku Cyumweru cyo ku itariki ya 15 Ukwakira 2017, Nelson Manzi na Irakiza Eunice bari bamaze igihe bakundana beretse ubukwe inshuti n’imiryango bambikana impeta y’urudashira ndetse basezerana kubana nk’umugore n’umugabo.
Ambassadors of Christ mubutumwa bageneye, uyu muryango bagize bati“Isabukuru nziza y’ubukwe kubo dukunda Nelson na Eunice. twishimira imirimo yawe muri korali. Imigisha myinshi muzira yawe… komeza urabagirane kugeza impanda ivuze”
Nelson Manzi ni umuririmbyi wa korali Ambassadors of Christ yo mu itorero ry’Abadivantiste b’umunsi wa karindwi ndetse akaba n’umwe mu bayobozi bayo.
Ku wa Kane tariki 12 Ukwakira 2017 nibwo basezeranye imbere y’amategeko mu muhango wabereye ku murenge wa Remera mu mujyi wa Kigali.

Yanditswe na Sezibera Anselme
Ikigo k’Igihugu gishinzwe ubushakashatsi no guteza imbere inganda (NIRDA), kiragaragaza gahunda gifite mu gutanga umusanzu ugamije gutuma inganda zo mu Rwanda zibasha gukora ibintu byujuje ubuziranenge bituma ibyo zikora bibasha kugera ku masoko mpuzamahanga.

... (834 chars skipped) ... 
azwa umusaruro mu kuzongerera agaciro, Kampeta akavuga ko kuba iyo mibare ikiri hasi biterwa n’ubushobozi bw’inganda byaba ari mu mafaranga, haba kubona isoko ndetse n’uburyo bwo kubitunganya bijyanye n’ikoranabuhanga.
Kampeta kandi avuga ko NIRDA iri gushaka umuti wo gukemura ikibazo k’imbuto zigaragara nk’aho ari nke kandi zihenze ku masoko, bagirana ubufatanye na RAB nk’Ikigo gishinzwe kuzitunganya no kuzishyikiriza abahinzi kugira ngo zibyazwe umusaruro kandi zongerwe.

NIRDA igaragaza ko ahagaragaye ibihombo rimwe na rimwe byatewe n’inzira umusaruro unyuzwamo uva mu murima ugezwa mu nganda kuko byagaragaye ko habayemo ibibazo, ariko nyuma yo kugabanuka MINAGRI n’Ikigo cyayo RAB byagiye bibifatira ingamba hanyuma NIRDA nayo ikaba ije kubafasha muri urwo rugamba rujyanye n’ubukangurambaga n’ishyirwa mu bikorwa.

Ese kurota inzozi mbi ni iki?
Inzozi mbi kimwe n’izindi nzozi zibaho ku bw’imikorere y’ubwonko akenshi iba ica amarenga y’ibyabaye,ibiri kuba cyangwa ikanahanura ibizaba.
Urubuga, everydayhealth.com, ruvuga ko inzozi mbi ari izigutera ubwoba,igihunga cyangwa kumva uhangayitse. Ubu bwoko bw’inzozi uwabugize akenshi abyuka yibuka inzozi zose cyangwa ig

ozi mbi ngo ari nziza ku mubiri w’umuntu. Akenshi inzozi mbi zikunze kubaho igihe umuvuduko w’amaraso ava mu bwonko ajya mu mitsi no mu bindi bice by’umubiri wagabanutse.
Nubwo inzozi mbi zitishimirwa, zifite umumaro wo kuba zatuma ikwirakwira ry’amaraso mu mubiri rigenda neza.
- Inzozi mbi zigisha umuntu guhangana n’ibikomeye
Ubundi bushakashatsi ku nzozi mbi, bwagaragaje ko ari umwarimu mwiza wigisha muntu guhangana n’ibikomeye. Nk’uko bigara mu ngingo ya 1, inzozi mbi zifasha umuntu kwiga inz
... (652 chars skipped) ...
ushyaga umutwe.

Abashakashatsi bagaragaje ko akenshi ku bantu bahuye n’ihungabana, inzozi mbi zabo zigaruka ku byo babonye cyangwa ku byo bagiye kubona.
Kuri iyi ngingo, iyo urose ibiteye ubwoba byakubayeho biba ari bibi ku ruhande rumwe ariko bikaba byiza ku rundi kuko bigufasha kwibuka,kubabarira no kwigira ku byabaye. Iyo urose ibibi bizakubaho, bigutera kwitegura no gushakisha inzira yo kwirinda ko icyo warose cyaba ukuri koko.

Itorero Imena rizasusurutsa ibirori byo kwizihiza umunsi mpuzamahanga w’ururimi kavukire
Itorero Imena Cultural Troupe niryo rizaririmba mu kwizihiza umunsi mpuzamahanga w’ururimi kavukire uzizihizwa tariki 21 Gashyantare 2018 mu Karere ka Rubavu.
Buri tariki 21 Gashyantare nibwo isi yose yizihiza umunsi mpuzamahanga wahariwe kuzirikana ururimi kavukire.
Insanganyamatsiko y’uyu mwaka iragira iti " Twimakaze Ikinyarwanda, turengera ubusugire n’ireme byacyo."
Ibirori by’uyu mwaka bizizihirizwa mu 
... (606 chars skipped) ... 
 y’u Rwanda. Imena Cultural Troupe imaze guhagararira u Rwanda inshuro 3 muri Sauti za Busara, iserukiramuco riba buri mwaka muri Zanzibar.
Umwaka ushize uyu munsi wari wizihirijwe kuri ‘Petit Stade’ i Remera mu Mujyi wa Kigali tariki 24 Werurwe 2017. Insanganyamatsiko yari ’Kwiga no kunoza Ikinyarwanda ni inshingano yanjye nawe. "
Umunsi Mpuzamahanga w’Ururimi Kavukire uhabwa agaciro gakomeye mu Rwanda. Inteko Nyarwanda y’Ururimi n’Umuco ivuga ko ari umwanya mwiza wo kuzirikana agaciro k’ururim
... (606 chars skipped) ...
mbere Ururimi rw’Igihugu, ari na rwo ngobyi y’Umuco no gukangurira Abanyarwanda, cyane cyane urubyiruko, gukunda no kuvuga Ikinyarwanda, guhanga mu Kinyarwanda ndetse no kumenya ubukungu bukubiye mu rurimi rwabo.
Semanza Jean Baptiste bakunda kwita Jaba Star Intore ari mu bahanzi b’Imena bazaririmba muri ibyo birori
Danny Vumbi ufite indirimbo ‘Ni dange’ ikomoza ku bahonyora ururimi kavukire na we azaririmba muri ibi birori
Itorero Imena niryo rizasusurutsa ibirori by’uyu mwaka

Igikoresho cya Strawberry gikingira net
Imiyoboro ya Strawberry ikoresha ibikoresho byinshi bya polyethylene (HDPE), hamwe nu mwuka mwiza.Ibikoresho bifite umutekano, ntabwo ari uburozi kandi ntiburyohe.Hamwe no kurwanya ubushyuhe bwiza no kurwanya ubukonje, ubuzima burebure.Ibi bikoresho ntabwo bikurura amazi byoroshye, bityo bifasha kugumya imbuto za strawberry.
1.Tandukanya ibyatsi biva mu butaka kugirango bidahura neza nubutaka.Mugabanye guhura nubutaka butose kandi ugabanye strawberry milde
... (276 chars skipped) ... 
abara meza.Kora ibihingwa bikure kandi bitezimbere isukari yibara.Nyuma yo gushonga, guhumeka amazi yubutaka ni bito, bishobora gutuma amazi yubutaka ahagarara igihe kirekire kandi bikarinda neza amazi yubutaka.Ubushyuhe bwubutaka nubushuhe birakwiye, ibikorwa bya mikorobe birakomeye kandi kubora intungamubiri birihuta, bityo ibiri muri azote iboneka, fosifore, potasiyumu nintungamubiri byiyongera ugereranije numurima ufunguye.
2.Bishobora kwirinda ingaruka z'umuyaga n'imvura hejuru yubutaka kan
... (276 chars skipped) ...
eza indwara nudukoko twangiza.Kugirango ushireho uburyo bwiza bwo gukura kuri strawberry, utezimbere iterambere rya sisitemu yumuti wa strawberry, gukura kwa strawberry gukomera, kwikuramo imbaraga.
3. Gutandukanya imbuto za strawberry mu butaka, gabanya umwanda uri mu butaka bufatanye hejuru y’imbuto za strawberry, bigira ingaruka ku isura yaryo, ntibishobora kwangirika, kandi bizamura cyane ubwiza bw’imbuto za strawberry.Tanga strawberry hejuru yuzuye, uzamure umusaruro nubwiza bwa strawberry.

Ibarura rusange ry’abaturage DHS ryagaragaje ko abagore banywa inzoga bagasinda ari bo bakunze kwibasirwa n’ihohoterwa rikorwa n’abagabo babo kurusha abatanywa, cyangwa se abanywa ariko ntibasinde.
Ibarura rya DHS 2014-2015 riherutse gushyirwa ahagaragara n’Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’ibarurishamibare NISR, ryagaragaje ko mu bagabo 83 bafite abagore basinda 42% muri bo barabahohotera, mu gihe mu bagabo 648 bafite abatanywa inzoga, ababahohotera ni 18%.
Mu mezi 12 mbere y’uko hakorwa iri barura, iki kigereranyo cyari hasi, abagabo bangana na 27% bafite abagore basinda barabahohoteraga, mu gihe abahohoteraga abagore badasinda bari ku rugero rwa 6%.
Iri barura kandi ryagaragaje ko abagabo 73 babajijwe batinya abagore babo cyane cyangwa se babatinya rimwe na rimwe (915) ari bo babahohotera ku rugero rwo hejuru (36% ) kurusha abatabatinya .
Na ho abafite ba se bahohotera ba nyina, na bo ngo bakunze guhohotera abagore babo ku rugero rwo hejuru ugereranyije n’abakuriye mu ngo aho ababyeyi babo bari babanye neza.
U Rwanda rumaze kugabanya ku buryo bugaragara ihohoterwa rikorerwa abagore, kuri ubu rukaba ruri mu bihugu bifite umubare munini w’abagore mu nteko.

Ni iki wakora kugira ngo urukundo ruhore ari rushya?.
Kugira ngo urukundo rwawe n'uwo mwashakanye ruhore ari rushya nuko mugerageza guhindura ibintu bimwe na bimwe biba bisa nk'ibimenyewe mukagerageza kugenda muzana udushya. Birashoboka ko ushobora kwigana iby'abandi ariko sinangombwa nawe ubwawe ushobora kwihimbira utwawe dushya, kuburyo uwo mwashakanye abona ko ibintu bihora ari bishya mu rugo rwanyu. Aha ushobora gukeka ko bihenze cyangwa bigoye.
Ntago bihenze ntanubwo binagoye icyo bisaba nuko ufata umwanya ugatekereza kuwo mwashakanye ukareba ikintu gishyashya ushobora kumukorera utari warigeze umukorera mbere.
Ingero
Si ngombwa ko ukora ibyo ngiye kukubwira ariko wabigenderaho ugahimba utwawe dushya. Icyo ushobora gukora cyoroheje niba bishoboka, ushobora guhindura icyerekezo uburiri muryamaho bwari bufite, ukabuha ikindi cyerekezo, cyangwa se ugahindura uburyo icyumba muryamamo cyari gitatse. Niba inzu yanyu ifite ibyumba byinshi mushobora no guhindura mu kimukira mu kindi cyumba kuburyo bigaragarako hari icyahindutse. Mushobora no guhindura uko intebe zari ziteye mu ruganiriro. Niba uwo mwashakanye mutarigeze mujyana mu kwiyuhagira muri kumwe mushobora kubigerageza. Ikindi nuko mushobora guhindura uburyo mwajyaga muteramo urubariro cyangwa se mu gahindura isaha naho mwajyaga muruterera, ibi birafasha cyane kuko bituma urukundo rwanyu rudasaza bigahora ari bishya.

Abantu benshi bafite uko basobanura urukundo ariko burya na Bibiliya ifite igisobanuro itanga.
Urukundo ni ifunguro buri wese asabwa kugaburira roho ye yabyanga yabyemera. Urukundo ni umuti w'ibintu byinshi ndetse ni ubuzima bw'uwemera Imana nk'uko Bibiliya ibigaragaza.
Muri Bibiliya ku bayemera, muri Yohana wa mbere igice cya 4 umurongo 7 kugeza ku wa 8, bagaraza ko urukundo ari imico y'Imana. "Bakundwa, dukundane kuko urukundo ruva ku Mana. Umuntu wese ukunda yabyawe n’Imana kandi azi Imana. U
... (271 chars skipped) ... 
bw'urukundo, haba urwa kivandimwe n'urw'abakundana n'abashakanye.
Mu gitabo cya Bibiliya, mu gitabo cya Itangiriro 2:18, bagaragaza ko Imana yaremye abantu babiri kugira ngo bakundane. Haranditse ngo "Kandi Uwiteka Imana iravuga iti “Si byiza ko uyu muntu aba wenyine, reka muremere umufasha umukwiriye.”
Uretse kuba Imana yarasabye abantu gukundana, yanabibukije kwihangana nk'intwaro y'urukundo dore ko biri mu gitabo cya Abakorinto 13;4 ugakoneza. Hati:" Urukundo rurihangana rukagira neza, urukun
... (271 chars skipped) ...
 twe gukundana urumamo mu magambo cyangwa ku rurimi, ahubwo dukundane mu byo dukora no mu by’ukuri".
Mu by'ukuri Imana yatanze umucyo k'urukundo no kugisobanuro cy'urukundo. Muri Petero wa Mbere 17 hagira hati: "Mwubahe abantu bose, mukunde bene Data, mwubahe Imana, mwubahe umwami".
Urukundo rw'ukuri ni ikintu kigaragarira mu kuri, kandi ku Isi ya none kirahari kuko urukundo ruhari. Buri wese aba asabwa gukunda mugenzi we nk'uko nawe amukunda.Imana ikeneye ko abantu bakundana.

KOROWASIYA
ZAGREB, Korowasiya—Abahamya ba Yehova bitabiriye ku ncuro ya mbere imurika mpuzamahanga ry’ibitabo n’ibikoresho by’imfashanyigisho ryabaye ku itariki ya 11-16 Ugushyingo 2014. Iryo murika riba buri mwaka, ryitabirwa n’abantu baje kumurika babarirwa mu magana, harimo abacapa ibitabo n’abigisha, kandi ni rimwe mu mamurika akomeye abera muri Korowasiya. Imurika ry’uyu mwaka ni ryo ryitabiriwe kurusha ayandi yose, kuko ryajemo abantu bagera hafi ku 130.000.
Mu basuye aho

ya bamurikaga kandi atoranya bimwe mu bitabo byabo bivuga ibihereranye na siyansi na Bibiliya. Ibyo bitabo ni Cinq questions à se poser sur l’origine de la vie, Ese ubuzima bwabayeho biturutse ku irema? na La vie: comment est-elle apparue? Évolution ou création?
Mu bintu Abahamya bamurikaga, icyakunzwe cyane ni igice cyagenewe abana, kuko abahasuye bose berekwaga videwo zigenewe abana zo ku rubuga rwemewe rw’Abahamya ba Yehova (jw.org), zigisha abana ibintu byo muri Bibiliya. Abahasuye, akenshi 
... (125 chars skipped) ...
uko.
Josip Liović, umuvugizi w’Abahamya ba Yehova muri Korowasiya, yagize ati “twashimishijwe n’ukuntu twakiriwe neza muri iri murika. Twageze ku bintu byinshi birenze ibyo twatekerezaga, kuko abaje aho twamurikiraga batwaye ibitabo bisaga 7.500. Dutegerezanyije amatsiko imurika ryo mu mwaka utaha, kugira ngo twongere guha abantu ibitabo byacu.”

Inzira yo guhimba ibiziga bya aluminiyumu ni ugukoresha umuvuduko mwinshi (cyane cyane toni 10,000 z'umuvuduko) kugirango ukande igice kivanze cyashyutswe kugeza kuri dogere 500 muri urusoro rukomeye (prototype) rw'uruziga, rukagira inzira ikomeye yo kuzunguruka, hanyuma winjire muri T6 Ubushyuhe bwo kuvura, hanyuma gutunganya kabiri hamwe na CNC ibisobanuro birambuye.
Inziga mpimbano ni ibiziga bikozwe no guhimba. Inziga zakozwe murubu buryo zirashobora gukuraho imyenge yimbere ninyuma kurwego runini. Kandi ikoreshwa kenshi muburyo bwo kwibagirwa inshuro nyinshi, zishobora kwemeza ko hakurwaho inenge zitandukanye, kongera imbaraga zimbere yibikoresho, kandi gukomera bizaba byiza, bishobora guteza imbere cyane ingaruka zo kurwanya no kurira kumuvuduko mwinshi. .
Inziga zimpimbano zizaguha ingaruka zigaragara, kandi umutekano nibikorwa birashobora guhuzwa rwose.
Umurongo wo gutwikisha ibyuma byikora ntabwo utezimbere gusa kwizerwa no kuramba kwuruziga, ahubwo binanoza isura no kurimbisha. Ibikorwa byose byakozwe byateguwe mubuhanga kandi bishyirwa mubikorwa, buri murongo urakurikiranwa kandi ucungwa neza, kandi buri gicuruzwa cyakorewe igenzura rikomeye, kugirango buri ruziga ruhinduke akazi keza, rutanga ubuziranenge bwiza bwa serivisi zabakiriya.
Kunoza uburyo bwiza bwo gutwara. Bitewe nibiranga ibiziga byahimbwe, icyerekezo cyo gutwara kiroroha nyuma yo kwishyiriraho, kandi gutwara umuvuduko mwinshi birahagaze neza, bityo bikazamura umunezero wo gutwara.

Igikoresho Cyo Gukwirakwiza Amashusho Ya Digitale Tria nimwe mubintu bishya bya Smart Set Top Top Box ya Vestel itanga tekinoroji yo gutangaza amakuru kubakoresha TV. Tria imico yingenzi ni "guhumeka guhisha". Guhumeka bihishe bituma bishoboka gukora ibishushanyo byihariye kandi byoroshye. Nyamara, imbere mu gifuniko cya plastiki hari icyuma gikoreshwa mukurinda ubushyuhe bukabije bwibicuruzwa. Ibindi bintu bya tekiniki biranga agasanduku ni; itanga imikorere yikoranabuhanga yuzuye nko gukina itangazamakuru ritandukanye (umuziki, videwo, ifoto) ukoresheje interineti nububiko bwitangazamakuru bwite. Sisitemu ikora ya Tria ni sisitemu ya Android V4.2 Jelly Bean.
Izina ry'umushinga : Tria Set Top Box, Izina ryabashushanya : Vestel ID Team, Izina ry'abakiriya : Vestel Electronics Co..
Igishushanyo cyiza nuwatsindiye igihembo cyumuringa mububatsi, kubaka no guhatanira imiterere. Ugomba rwose kubona ibihembo bya bronze byegukana ibishushanyo mbonera bya portfolio kugirango umenye ibindi byinshi bishya, bishya, byumwimerere kandi bihanga imyubakire, inyubako nuburyo bwo gukora.

Mibambwe III Mutabazi II Sentabyo, ni mwene Ndabarasa wa Rujugira na Nyiratamba wa Sesonga, umugabekazi ukomoka mu muryango mugari w’Abega. Yimye ahasaga mu wa 1741 kugeza mu wa 1746, irindi zina yitwaga ni « Muhwerazikamwa ». Yimye ingoma azunguye se Kigeli III Ndabarasa.
Muhwerazikamwa ni izina yahawe na Sekuru Rujugira kuko yari ananutse cyane, kandi ntacyo kwa Ndabarasa bari
... (1788 chars skipped) ... 
ntabyo yazunguwe n’umwe muri abo bahungu be yabyaye hanze ariwe Gahindiro wimye ingoma akiri uruhinja rw’imyaka ibiri. Nkezabo we amateka atugaragariza ko yapfanye na se Sentabyo, bose bishwe n’ubushita, bandujwe buvuye mu Gisaka.
Nubwo Sentabyo bigaragara ko yabyaye abana babiri ku bagore batandukanye, ariko nta mugore n’umwe uzwi mu mateka yigeze ashaka mu buryo buzwi.

Bwiza yamaze gushyira hanze amashusho y’indirimbo ye nshya yise ‘Best friend’ aho yayifatanyije na The Ben, gusa umushinga wo kuyikora ntabwo wari woroshye kuko byinshi mu byari byateguwe mu ifatwa ry’amashusho yayo byaje guhinduka ku munota wa nyuma.
Nk’ubu amakuru IGIHE ifite ahamya ko John Elarts wayifatiye amashusho yiyambajwe by’ikubagahu, dore ko atari we wari wateguwe mu ikorwa ry’amashusho yayo kuko KIKAC Music yifuzaga ko yakorwa na Fayzo Pro ndetse ibiganiro byaratangiye ku mpande zombi.
Mu gihe haburaga iminsi mike ngo umushinga wo gufata amashusho y’iyi ndirimbo utangire gushyirwa mu bikorwa, Fayzo Pro yaje kwivanamo mu buryo butunguranye.
Ubuyobozi bwa KIKAC Music butari bufite igihe kinini cyo gushaka andi mahitamo, nyuma yo kuganira na The Ben, bemeranyije gukorana na John Elarts ahita akatirwa itike y’indege shishi itabona aza mu Rwanda, dore ko akomoka mu Burundi.
John Elarts wagombaga kugera i Kigali bugacya akora akazi, yasabye ko nibura yahabwa undi munsi bakabona gufata amashusho y’iyi ndirimbo, aho yabanje gusura aho bazafatira amashusho.

Madamu Jeannette Kagame akaba n’Umuyobozi w’ikirenga wa Imbuto Foundation, yitabiriye inama y’umuryango w’abagiraneza bo muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, ‘Bloomberg Philanthropies’, abereka ibikorwa Imbuto Foundation imaze kugeraho mu guteza imbere Abanyarwanda mu myaka 16 ishize.
Muri iyi nama yabereye muri London, abayobozi ba Bloomberg Philanthropies harimo n’uwashinze uy’umuryango akaba n’uwahoze ayobora umujyi wa New York, Michael Bloomberg, bagaragarijwe ibikorwa bya Imbuto Foundation, m
... (161 chars skipped) ... 
gahunda n’imishinga 15 zigamije guteza imbere uburezi, ubuzima, ubukungu, urubyiruko n’umuryango mu byiciro bitandukanye by’Abanyarwanda.
Aha harimo gufasha abana gusubira mu ishuri, guhemba abakobwa batsinze neza mu bizamini bya Leta, gufasha abanyeshuri kwiga amashuri yisumbuye bahabwa ibikoresho bikenewe no kwishyurirwa amafaranga y’ishuri, kubaka ingo mbonezamikurire z’abana bato (ECD), ndetse no guteza imbere abagore, n’umuryango Nyarwanda.
Imbuto Foundation inafasha abangavu bagahabwa amas
... (161 chars skipped) ...
’indashyikirwa rwakoze ibikorwa bidasanzwe mu kwiteza imbere.
Bloomberg Philanthropies mu myaka 11 umaze, ukora ibikorwa bigamije kurengera ubuzima, ibidukikije, guteza imbere abagore no guhanga imirimo ku mugabane wa Afurika. Watangiye gukora ibikorwa mu Rwanda kuva mu 2007, wibanda mu bikorwa biteza imbere abagore.
Ibikorwa byawo kandi byaragutse bijya no muri gahunda zo gushishikariza abana mu gusoma no kwandika, gushyigikira uburyo bw’ikoranabuhanga bwo kwandika abapfuye n’abavutse n’ibindi.

Turateganya kubaka inzu zirenga ibihumbi 370 kugeza mu 2022-Harerimana
Yanditswe na MUTUNGIREHE SAMUEL
Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri y’Ubutegetsi bw’Igihugu (MINALOC) ushinzwe Iterambere ry’Abaturage, Cyriaque Harerimana yatangaje ko Leta iteganya gutuza abaturage bagera ku bihumbi 370 mu gihugu hose, kugeza mu 2022 bityo bisaba abaturage kubaka birinda kujya mu manegeka, bakubaka inzu zirambye zikurikije igishushanyombonera, zidashyira mu kaga ubuzima bwabo n’ubw’abaturanyi.
Yabigarutse
... (730 chars skipped) ... 
mu migi ariko ayo ni ya yandi atuma abantu batura neza.”
Dufite ikibazo cy’abantu benshi batuye mu manegeka haba muri Kigali cyangwa hanze ya Kigali, birasaba ko umuturage aba umufasha wa mugenzi we mu kugira ngo icyo gikorwa kizagende neza.”
Yakomeje avuga ko hari n’abandi baturage badatuye mu manegeka ariko bakirengagiza ko inzu zabo zimena amazi ku za bagenzi babo bikaba byabasenyera bityo bagomba kujya bibuka gushyiraho n’uburyo bufata amazi y’imvura.

... (730 chars skipped) ...
ajyana n’uko igishushanyombonera giteganya mu ishusho y’Umujyi wa Kigali mu myaka iri imbere n’ubwiyongere bw’abazaba batuye Kigali.
Mu buryo bwo gukemura ibibazo by’abaturage, Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri y’Ubutegetsi bw’Igihugu Harerimana Cyriaque yafashije abaturage babiri mu nteko y’abaturage yari iri aho kubona uburyo bwo kugura mituweli bakabasha kwivuza no kuvuza abo mu miryango yabo ariko asaba buri muturage kujya abanza kwikemurira ibibazo by’ibanze nka mituweli mbere y’ibindi.

Bamwe mu baturage bo mu murenge wa Rukira n’uwa Murama, mu Karere ka Ngoma baravuga ko babangamiwe no kuba amazi bakoreshaga atakibageraho, kuko ngo yahawe Kampani nshya irimo gukora ubushakashatsi bw’amabuye y’agaciro muri uyu murenge.
Abaturage bafite ikibazo muri rusange ni abo mu mirenge ibiri ariko bafatiraga amazi ku isooko y’ahitwa “Gasoko” iherereye mu murenge wa Rukira.
Aba baturage babwiye umunyamakuru wacu ko muri iyi minsi amazi yabuze ku buryo bukabije nubwo n’ubundi ngo yari asanzw
... (575 chars skipped) ... 
ake, noneho ni ukuvuga ngo ni nko guhumira kumirari kuko noneho na hahandi yageraga yaragabanutse.”
Bushayija Francis, Umuyobozi w’Umurenge wa Rukira urimo gukorwamo ubu bushakashatsi bw’amabuye y’agaciro ndetse hakaba ari naho hubatse isooko itanga amazi muri Rukira na Murama, yatubwiye ko ibyo abaturage bavuga nta shingiro bifite.
Yemeza ko n’ubusanzwe amazi yari make kandi ngo abari gukora ubushakashatsi bafata amazi atarenze meterokibe eshatu, zikaba eshanu mu minsi ibiri.

Hashize iminsi amatungo yo mu Mirenge ya Gahini, Mwiri na Murundi mu Karere ka Kayonza agaragaje ibimenyetso by’indwara y’uburenge. RAB ivuga ko hashingiwe kuri ibyo bimenyetso, mu rwego rwo kurinda ko iyo ndwara igera mu matungo menshi kandi henshi, aborozi bo mu mirenge yavuzwe haruguru basabwe guhagarika ingendo z’inka, ihene, ingurube n’intama.
Ku mpamvu iyo ari yose yose, ayo matungo agomba kuguma aho yororewe.
RAB kandi yasabye ko icuruzwa ry’amata, inyama, impu n’ifumbire bikomoka ku nka,
... (153 chars skipped) ... 
te amatungo agaragaza cyangwa akekwaho ibimenyetso by’indwara y’uburenge guhita babimenyesha umukozi ushinzwe ubworozi ku Murenge.
Ikindi asaba ni uko hagomba gufatwa ingamba z’ubwirinzi zirimo gukumira urujya n’uruza rw’abantu bagana ahari amatungo arwaye, aborozi kandi bagakoresha umuti wica virusi itera indwara y’uburenge ku bikoresho byifashishwa mu bworozi.
Dr Ndabamenye yasabye aborozi gukumira izerera ry’amatungo, hashyirwaho ibyangombwa akenera buri munsi harimo kuyabonera amazi n’ibiryo
... (153 chars skipped) ...
ga, abantu cyangwa ibindi bikoresho bivuye mu gace karwaje.
Muri iri tangazo kandi aborozi basabwe gukingiza indwara y’uburenge amatungo arengeje amezi ane mu tugari twose turi mu mirenge yagarutsweho.
Itangazo rya RAB riburira ko uzakora ibinyuranyije n’ibyatangajwe, azahanishwa ibihano bikubiye mu itegeko rigena uburyo bwo kurinda no kurwanya indwara zanduza amatungo mu Rwanda.
Inzego zose, zaba iz’ibanze n’iz’umutekano, zirasabwa gukurikirana ko ayo mabwiriza ashyirwa mu bikorwa uko yakabaye.

Umuyobozi w’akarere ka Burera arasaba abayobozi batandukanye bo muri ako karere kwegera abaturage bayobora bakabumva, bakajya inama, bakabasobanurira neza gahunda zose za leta kuko aribwo buryo bw’imiyoborere myiza.
Semabagare Samuel avuga ko umuturage ashyira mu bikorwa gahuza za leta ari uko umuyobozi yazimusobanuriye neza. Igihe umuyobozi atazimusobanuriye ukwo bikwiye niho umuturage abona izo gahunda zimubangamiye

tu runaka nyamara batabasobanuriye ibyiza byabo. Ibyo bituma abo bayobozi bafata ibyemezo bihubutse maze bigakandamiza abaturage.

Agira ati “…hari gahunda ya “Mituel de Santé†ni ukurengera ubuzima. Hari gahunda ya 12YBE ni uburere n’uburezi bw’abana bacu. Hari gahunda ubungubu iriho yo korora neza, yo kugira isuku, yo gutura mu midugudu…kugira ngo ibikorwa remezo
... (332 chars skipped) ...
yisumbuye kuyo bagize ari ukubera zimwe muri gahunda zitashyizwe mu bikorwa neza kubera imyumvire y’abaturage
Imwe muri izo gahunda harimo kuringaniza urubyaro. Mu mihigo y’umwaka 2011-2012 akarere ka Burera kagize amanota 55% mu kuringaniza urubyaro. Ibyo byatumye amanota agabanuka nk’uko umuyobozi w’akarere ka Burera abisobanura.
Yongera ho ko abona abanyaburera bagenda batanga ikizere mu guhindura imyumvire. Akomeza asaba abayobozi kwegera abo baturage kugira bahindure imyumvire byimaze yo.

Abo ni abatuye mu Mirenge ya Rusatira, Huye, Kinazi, Mbazi na Simbi yo mu Karere ka Huye ndetse no mu Murenge wa Cyanika ho mu Karere ka Nyamagabe, bigishijwe gusoma no kwandika ku nkunga y’umuryango Aprojumap.
Babigaragaje ubwo bashyikirizwaga impamyabushobozi n’uyu muryango tariki 21 Ugushyingo. Ni nyuma y’amezi 11 bigishwa gusoma, kwandika no kubara.
Augustin Ngendahimana w’i Rugango mu Murenge wa Mbazi, umwe mu 106 bahawe impamyabushobozi, n’akanyamuneza yagize ati “Najyaga kwiga njyanye ika
... (377 chars skipped) ... 
urya kubaho uzi ururimi rumwe bitera ipfunwe. Nk’uko mwagize igitekerezo cyo kudukura mu bwigunge, burya kutamenya gusoma ni bibi, muzagumye mudutere ingabo mu bitugu tumenye n’Igiswayire, Igifaransa n’Icyongereza.”
Ngendahimana ubu afite imyaka 31. Ntiyigeze akandagira mu ishuri kuko mama we yapfuye ageze mu gihe cyo kuritangira, nuko papa we amusaba kuguma mu rugo ngo amufashe amatungo.
Aho yamenyeye gusoma no kwandika ngo asigaye abasha gusoma ubutumwa kuri terefone adasomesheje, akabasha kwa
... (377 chars skipped) ...
 igihombo yaterwaga nokutamenya kubara. Icyakora ntiyigeze acika intege.
Aho yamenyeye gusoma no kwandika ndetse no kubara ubu yumva yaratinyutse, ku buryo yumva n’izindi ndimi yaziga.
Anabwira ab’urungano rwe batazi gusoma no kwandika ko n’ubwo umuntu yaba ashaje bitamubuza kwiga, akanasaba ababyeyi guharanira ko abana babo biga kuko bituma bamenya ubwenge.
Ati “Nta muntu nakwifuza ko akura umwana mu ishuri kuko nanjye nta bwenge nari nzi. Tekereza kubona barampaga amafaranga ngasubiza menshi!”

Ibikorwa rusange by’Umuganda bifitiye akamaro igihugu n’abaturage guhera muri 2007 byunganiye ingengo y’imari y’igihugu amafaranga 127 939 034 516.
Minisiteri y’Ubutegetsi bw’Igihugu itangaza ko ibikorwa by’Umuganda byunganiye ingengo y’imari y’igihugu, kuko agaciro k’Umuganda mu mafaranga mu 2007 kari 4 112 943 849 ariko mu ngengo y’imari ya 2016/2017 umuganda wabarirwaga amafaranga y’u Rwanda 21 500 025 813, kikubye inshuro 5 ugereranyije n’icyo gihe.
Muri rusange guhera muri 2007 kugeza ubu, 
... (1898 chars skipped) ... 
ra uruhare mu gufata ibyemezo biteza imbere imibereho yabo kandi bakaba aba mbere mu gukurikirana ishyirwa mu bikorwa ry’ibyo byemezo.

Urwego rw’ubutabera, Politiki, n’izindi nzego zawuteje imbere kandi hashize igihe ziwifashisha mu kugera ku ntego zazo kuko nyuma y’Umuganga abaturage n’abayobozi baganira bakungurana ibitekerezo ku ngingo zitandukanye.

nge wahembwe miliyoni 1 y’amafaranga y’u Rwanda.

Mu Iteraniro Ryera, Abapasiteri b’Itorero Angilikani bambara imyenda itandukanye n’iy’abandi igatwikira imyenda yabo isanzwe. Mbese ni ukubera iki?
Ni ukubera ko ibyo bakora batabikora ku giti cyabo ahubwo babikora mu izina ry’undi muntu ubarenze, ari we Yesu-Kristo. Iyo bari mu iteraniro, baba bagomba kwambara imyenda itandukanye n’iyo bambara bari mu kazi kabo bwite-Ni nk’
... (1485 chars skipped) ... 
e utaremereye.” (Mat 11:29-30) Iyo Pasiteri yambaye Sikafu, yibuka ko ari umugaragu wa Kristo kandi akaba agomba kwemera kwikorera umutwaro amwikoreza, bityo akaba arimo kubwiriza abakristo bose ko nabo bagomba kwemera gukora gutyo kuko Kristo nawe ubwe yemeye kwikorera imitwaro yabo (kandi yo yari iremereye).
Sikafu zigira amabara n’ingano (ubugari) bitandukanye bitewe n’urwego umupasiteri ariho mu Itorero ndetse n’igihe cya liturujiya. Amabara akunze gukoreshwa ni icyatsi kibisi, umukara, umut
... (1485 chars skipped) ...
sm”, bityo nkaba nsaba umusomyi waba afite igitekerezo yongera ku byo nagerageje gushakashaka ko yagitanga, akaba yunguye abasomyi bagenzi be. Na none kandi, sinavuga ko muri iyi nyandiko ngufi gutya nabashije gusubiza ibibazo byose abantu bibaza ku myambarire y’Abapasiteri b’Abangilikani. Urugero, sinavuze ku myambaro y’Abasenyeri, Abacidikoni, etc. Nasabaga abandi bashakashatsi babishoboye ko bazasubukurira aha ngereje, bityo tugakomeza guhugurana.

Isuri ni imwe mu bizahaza ubutaka buhingwa n’ubudahingwa, ikaba ikomeje guca ibintu muri iki gihe cy’imvura. Abaturage bafatanyije n’abayobozi bakaba bahamagarirwa kugira uruhare rugaragara mu kuyirwanya.
Iyo witegereje, usanga muri iki gihe cy’imvura ubutaka bujyanwa n’isuri ari bwinshi, ndetse ugasanga n’imigezi yarahindutse icyondo kubera isuri ryayimanukiyemo. Leta ikaba ikomeje gushaka ingamba zishoboka mu rwego rwo kuyirwanya burundu. Ni muri urwo rwego Abanyarwanda basabwa gufatanyiriza h
... (110 chars skipped) ... 
twarwa n’isuri bukomeje kwiyongera.

Ubuyobozi ntibuhwema gushishikariza abaturage kurwanya isuri ku mirima yabo kugira ngo ubutaka bwabo butajyanwa n’isuri, bityo ubutaka bahingaga bugakomeza kuba buto.

... (110 chars skipped) ...
wa kuko ari nabo bafite ikibazo kurusha abandi. Ni ngombwa ko buri wese afata ingamba zo kurwanya isuri ku mirima ye, ndetse na bamwe bangiza inkombe z’ibiyaga bahinga cyangwa imisozi bacukuramo amabuye y’agaciro.
Leta nayo ikwiye gufata ingamba zihamye ndetse ikanashyiraho politiki yo kurwanya isuri mu gihugu, kugira ngo ibibazo biterwa nayo birimo itenguka ry’imisozi ari ryo rimwe na rimwe ritera ibiza bikomeje kwibasira abaturage mu bice bitandukanye by’igihugu bihagarikwe burundu.

Ikawa "OIIIO" ni ibikoresho bigezweho bigizwe n'ibikoresho (ameza yikawa + birashoboka ko imbere hashyirwaho ameza muri sisitemu) yateguwe nuwashushanyaga Polonye Wojciech Morsztyn. Tekinoroji yo guhindura ibintu kumeza yibintu itanga igitekerezo nkaho cyakozwe mugice kimwe cyibiti gitanga ibyiyumvo bidasanzwe. Murukurikirane rwameza aboneka mumabara atatu atandukanye: ibara ryibiti bisanzwe, umukara, umweru.
Izina ry'umushinga : oiiio, Izina ryabashushanya : Wojciech Morsztyn, Izina ry'abakiriya : WM Design.
Igishushanyo cyiza nuwatsindiye ibihembo byubushakashatsi mumarushanwa yo gupakira. Ugomba rwose kubona ibihembo byatsindiye abashushanya ibishushanyo mbonera bya portfolio kugirango umenye ibindi byinshi bishya, bishya, byumwimerere kandi bihanga ibikoresho byo gupakira.

Mu bihugu bigize Umurryango w’Afurika y’Iburasirazuba ikoranabuhanga rya telefoni mu guhererekanya amafaranga n’amakuru y’uko konti y’umuntu ihagaze, byagabanyije umurongo w’abirirwaga kuri za banki babaza amakuru ya konti zabo.
Hakoreshejwe telefone zigendanwa umuntu abasha kumenya amafaranga afite kuri banki runaka, akamenya amafaranga afite muri konti ye ya telefoni, ashobora kuba yakoherereza undi bityo bikoroshya ingendo zo kwerekeza kuri Banki.
Raporo yakozwe muri uyu mwaka wa 2012, igarag
... (216 chars skipped) ... 
wa Mobile Money Transfer, bikoresha ubu buryo. Amafaranga yatanzwe muri ubu buryo asaga 741,445,108,116.
Mu Rwanda bakoresha MTN Mobile Money, Tigo Cash na Mobile Banking, aho umuntu abasha kubikuza amafaranga yoherejwe n’undi akanayohereza. Uyohereje n’uyoherejwe hari amafaranga amukurwaho bitewe n’umubare yayoherejwe.
Mu gihugu cya Tanzania ho uburyo bwa Mobile Money Transfer bukoreshwa hakoreshwa uburyo butandukanye burimo MPesa , Tigo Pesa , ZPesa, CRDB, Push mobile, NMB Mobile n’ibindi.

Mu Rwanda usanga no kumihanda abacuruza amakarita ya TiGO babasha guha umuntu amafaranga ye yabikijwe kuri Tigo Cash, igisabwa ni ukwerekana ubutumwa bugufi no kwerekana ikarita y’irangamuntu.
MTN nayo ngo yorohereza ababikuza, kuko igenda ifungura amashami menshi ya MTN Mobile Banking ahantu hatandukanye, horohereza abafatabuguzi bayo guhabwa serivisi.

Mu cyerekezo 2050, u Rwanda rwiyemeje kuza mu bihugu bya mbere ku Isi mu kurwanya ruswa. Zimwe mu ngamba zizatuma rubigeraho zirimo gushyiraho amategeko, ubukangurambaga ndetse no gutoza abakiri bato kurwanya ruswa.
Mukama yavuze ko kwigisha amasomo yo kurwanya ruswa mu mashuri nk’uko higishwa Igifaransa, Icyongereza n’andi, bizatuma ububi bwa ruswa bucengera mu bana, bikabajya mu maraso.

Havuguruwe itegeko rigenga amasoko ya leta mu gukumira ruswa yakundaga kugaragara mu itangwa ry’amasoko ya leta.
Hari itegeko ryerekeye imari n’umutungo bya leta ryavuguruwe umwaka ushize, itegeko rigenga abatanga amakuru ku byaha, ibikorwa cyangwa imyitwarire inyuranyije n’amategeko n’ayandi.

Amakuru atangazwa na Rwambonera Vianney, umuyobozi w’Umudugudu wa Kirambo aho nyakwigendera yapfiriye, aravuga ko tariki ya 23 Mutarama 2013 ahagana mu ma saa yine z’amanywa yahamagawe kuri telefoni n’umuyobozi w’Akagari ka Rwinyana, amubwira ko mu mudugudu we hapfiriyemo umu
... (16 chars skipped) ...

Nzabakurana bamujyanye ku bitaro bya Gitwe ngo harebwe icyamwishe, abaganga bemeza ko yishwe, akubiswe ikintu gikomeye kuko yri anafite uruguma mu mutwe.

Mu gusobanura ivanjiri y’umubibyi yasobanuriye urubyiruko ko Ijambo ry’Imana ryakirwa mu buryo bune (4). Ese wowe uri ubube? Umubibyi ajya kubiba imbuto zimwe zaguye:
Ni ngombwa ko urubyiruko mu gihe turimo rwakira ijambo ry’Imana kandi rukera imbuto, mukaba ubutaka bwiz
... (92 chars skipped) ... 
sobanura insanganyamatsiko Papa Fransisko yageneye urubyiruko uyu mwaka: “Ushoborabyose yangiriye ibitangaza” (Lk1, 49) yabibukije ko ibitangaza Imana ibakorera biri hafi yabo, mu buzima bwa buri munsi. IcyoImana ishingirahoni:
Urubyiruko rwahawe umugisha na Baptismu ya Yezu yari intangiriro y’urugendo rushya yari agiye gukora kuva i Nazareti no mu Galileya kugera i Yerusalemu. “Igitangaza cya mbere Imana yagukoreye ni ukuba umwana w’Imana binyuze muri Baptismu. Ibitangaza Imana ihora idukorera 
... (92 chars skipped) ...
, Itara duhabwa n’umwambaro wera twambikwa.
Mu gusoza, Nyiricyubahiro Musenyeri yagize ati:
“Forum y ‘urubyiruko yagombye kubaviramo umwanya wo kwibuka no kumenya gukoresha ubwenge bwanyu. Mugahitamo ubuzima buboneye. Ntabwo dushobora kubaho tutabahangayikiye. Imvune n’ibibazobyanyu turabizi! Ariko imbere yanyu hari ikizere gikomeye cyokubaho”. Mu guhitamo ubuzima hari ibintu bidubangayika nk’abarezi. Ntimugatomere mutazi aho mujya: gushaka, kwiha Imana. Mujyemubitekerezaho cyane”.

Yabibwiye abayobozi bahagarariye abandi mu Ntara y’Amajyepfo bari bitabiriye kwizihiza umunsi nyafurika wo kurwanya ruswa, i Nyamagabe, tariki 12 Nyakanga.
Yavuze ko impamvu abantu bagomba kubanza kwanga ruswa hanyuma bakabona kuyirwanya ari ukubera ko utarwanya ibyo utabona ko ari bibi, kandi ruswa ni mbi kuko imunga ubukungu bw’igihugu, bitewe n’uko imitungo yari kugirira abaturage akamaro muri rusange ishirira mu mifuka y’abantu bamwe.
Yagize ati “Hashingiwe kuri raporo ya Mo Ibrahim Foundati
... (1243 chars skipped) ... 
mbo cyangwa gahunda y’amaterasi nini cyane. Aho ngaho abayobozi bashobora kumvikana na ba rwiyemezamirimo kugira ngo bakuremo ayabo, noneho imirimo ya Leta igakorwa nabi. ”
Ibi ni na byo bituma usanga hari ba rwiyemezamirimo bananirwa kurangiza imirimo ijyanye n’amasoko batsindiye, cyangwa n’arangijwe ugasanga yakozwe nabi, urugero nk’amazu ya Leta yubakwa mu gihe gitoya akaba yashaje.
Umuvunyi mukuru avuga kandi ko kuva muri 2010, amafaranga yanyerejwe (na yo ni ruswa) yagejejwe mu manza agera 
... (1243 chars skipped) ...
se bazajya bagirana n’abaturage batazajya bibagirwa kubaganiriza kuri ruswa kuko imunga igihugu kandi ko bakwiye kuyirwanya.
Icyaha cya ruswa ubu cyashyizwe mu bidasaza, ku buryo igihe cyose umuntu imugaragayeho yabifungirwa, ndetse n’amafaranga yatwaye akayishyura, kabone n’ubwo ibye byatezwa cyamunara.
Umunsi nyafurika wo kurwanya ruswa n’ubwo wizihijwe ari ku ya 12 Nyakanga, ubwo washyirwagaho muri 2017 hemejwe ko uzajya wizihizwa ku itariki ya 11 Nyakanga. Ni ubwa kabiri wizihijwe mu Rwanda.

Habuzeho miliyari 72.8 Frw ngo intego bari bahawe igerweho kubera ibibazo by’ingamba zo kwirinda Coronavirus zafashwe guhera muri Werurwe, ibikorwa byinshi by’ubucuruzi bigafunga imiryango.

Abazitabira igitaramo ‘Mpa Amavuta Live Concert’ cya James na Daniella bitegure kuzahemburwa imitima
Itsinda rigizwe na James na Daniella rimaze kwamamara mu ndirimbo zo kuramya no guhimbaza Imana ryijeje abanyarwanda ibyishimo mu gitaramo cyabo cya mbere bagiye gukora mu mpera z’iki Cyumweru.
Iki gitaramo cyiswe “Mpa Amavuta Live Concert” gitegerejwe kubera muri Kigali Arena kuri iki Cyumweru tariki 1 Werurwe 2020, kuva I saa munani z’igicamunsi kugeza saa moya z’umugoroba.
Mu kiganiro n’itanga
... (224 chars skipped) ... 
anyamahanga ari uko bashatse ko igitaramo cyabo kiba umwihariko w’abahanzi nyarwanda.
Yagize ati “Natwe dufite abahanzi dukunda bo hanze ariko kuri iyi nshuro ntabwo twigeze dutekereza kubahamagara ahubwo dushaka umuziki Nyarwanda, mbese mu kinyarwanda.”
Yakomeje avuga ko icyo bifuza ari ugushimisha abazitabira iki gitaramo cyane ko aricyo cya mbere gikomeye bateguye kuva bagera mu Rwanda mu 2017.
Abahanzi bitabiriye ikikiganiro barimo ; Kavutse Olivier, Maya Fabrice, Papi Clever, Ben Serugo na 
... (224 chars skipped) ...
iya Ben na Chance ; Tuyizere Papi Clever na Ingabire Dorcas ; Maya na Fabrice na Amanda Fung na Kavutse Olivier babarizwa muri Beauty for Ashes.
Hazaba harimo kandi n’abahanzi bakomeye barimo Prosper Nkomezi, Gaby Kamanzi, Rene Patrickm Nelson ndetse na True Promises.
Kwinjira muri “Mpa Amavuta Live Concert” ku bazagura amatike mbere ni 3 000 Frw, 15 000 Frw na 30 000 Frw ku bazagura amatike mbere mu gihe abazayagurira ku muryango bizaba ari 5 000 Frw, 10 000 Frw na 20 000 Frw.

Ubujyanama, ni urubuga rwashinzwe kandi rugenzurwa na BIRAMAHIRE Francois. Ni urubuga rugamije kuguha inama mu buzima bwa buri munsi byaba imibanire, urukundo, indwara, imiti, imyororokere, n’ibindi binyuranye mu buzima bwa buri munsi tunyuramo.
Tunanyuzamo rimwe na rimwe inkuru ndende, kuko na zo hari abazikunda kandi buri yose iba irimo amasomo yigisha mu buzima.
Ibyo byose kugirango bishoboke, birumvikana bisaba umwanya, ubucukumbuzi, ubushakashatsi bunyuranye ndetse n’umwanya. Binasaba rimwe na rimwe kwigomwa kugirango haboneke ibikenewe ngo za nama zitangwe.
Inkunga yawe uko yaba ingana kose, yakunganira iki gikorwa ntikizazime kuko byose kugirango bishoboke hari ikiba cyabanje kwishyurwa nka hosting ya website, bundles za internet, abonnement hamwe na hamwe n’ibindi.
Niba wumva hari icyo wakora, uko cyaba kingana cyose, hari uburyo wakoresha kikatugeraho.

Nyuma y’uko hakozwe ubugenzuzi RRA ikigerera muri ibyo bihugu inyuze mu nzira zinyuzwamo ibicuruzwa mu rwego rwo kwimenyera amashirakinyo
... (755 chars skipped) ... 
a na byo tunabiganiraho mu buryo bw’amashirakinyoma ariko na bo batubwira ibibazo bahura na byo ngo tubishakire ibisubizo. Twasanze akenshi uruhare runini mu kutamenyekanisha umusoro rufitwe n’umucuruzi ku giti ke kuko ibikorwa byose babanza kumubaza akababwira icyo gukora. Twabagaragarije uruhare babifitemo kandi batwemereye ko tugiye gufatanya bigakosoka.”
Akomeza agira ati “Ikibazo cyabo nyamukuru ni uko wasangaga impapuro batanga bamenyekanisha umusoro zidahura, hakabamo na zimwe udashobora 
... (755 chars skipped) ...
a ku jisho, ni byiza ko ibyo babona bitagenda neza babitubwira kuko imisoro na twe idufitiye akamaro.”
Ikigo k’igihugu k’imisoro n’amahoro gitangaza ko abacuruzi batumiza ibintu hanze bafite ibibazo mu kumenyekanisha umusoro ari 1197, muri bo harimo 796 bari hasi cyane bangana na 12% by’abatumiza ibintu hanze bose, abandi 401 bo bari ku kigero kiringaniye.
Muri rusange, RRA itangaza ko 30% by’umusoro iki kigo kinjiza mu mwaka ari uturuka mu bucuruzi bunyura kuri za gasutamo.

Hari byinshi twatanga bifite agaciro kanini cyane kurusha amafaranga, ICYUBAHIRO, buri gihe ujye wubaha ababyeyi bawe kuko urukundo rwinshi baguha, baruguha nta kiguzi.

Umwe mu bagore ba Perezida wa repubulika y’Afurika y’Epfo Jacob Zuma, Thobeka Zuma aherutse kwandika ku rubuga nkoranyambaga rwa Instagram amagambo adasanzwe y’urukundo akunda umugabo we Jacob Zuma yakoze ku mitima ya benshi.
Mu ntangiriro z’uyu mwaka wa 2017, nibwo uyu mugore yanditse amagambo asingiza bidasanzwe asa n’akubiye mu ibaruwa yandikiye umugabo we perezida Zuma amutaka uburyo adahwema kumwitaho ndetse no kugaragaza umurava mu kazi ke ka buri munsi nubwo hari abadahwema kumuharabika bamushinja ibinyoma n’ibindi bigamije gusenya umuryango wa mbere mu gihugu.
Yagize ati “niba bigushimishije, ibuka ku itariki ya 21 ubwo twahuraga bwa mbere, icyo gihe nashoboraga no kuba ndi ku rundi ruhande nko ku mucuruzi, umunyabanko n’ahandi ariko tubyihorere ni amateka.
Imitima yacu yatekerezaga ibyayo, urukundo rwacu rwabaye igihamya cyo kuba turi kumwe mu mijyi itandukanye twajyanyemo, gusa mu myaka ishize yose ndacyari mu rukundo nawe.
Njya ntekereza turi kuzamuka imisozi urukundo rwacu rugashisha turwumva ndetse rusa n’urwahawe umugisha n’Imana kandi Imana yahawe ikuzo ku bw’ibyo.
Ubu uri umugabo wanjye w’ubuzima bwose mu myaka irenga 24 y’ubucuti, uri urukundo rw’ubuzima bwanjye, ndakubaha.
Kimwe n’andi magambo menshi agaragaza uko Perezida Zuma yita ku muryango we ndetse inshuro nyinshi akaba akunda kuba akina n’abana be cyane cyane ab’abakobwa ndetse n’abuzukuru be.
Uyu mugore yatangaje ko atabashije guhisha amarangamutima ye ku mugabo we nk’uko bayaba no ku wundi wese.

ubwo nijoro Samandara n'umugore we baryamye, Samandara abwira umugore we nkibìsanzwe ati "reka mbe nigiriye kuba ndeba umupira muri salon" umugore aramubwira ati "genda." Akimara kugenda, umugore nawe ahita abyuka ajya muri cya cyumba cy'umukozi buhoro buhoro, akuramo imyenda yose ubundi azimya itara aryama kuri icyo gitanda cy'umukozi. Umuryango utari uwa Leta, ushinzwe kuvugira abafite ubumuga bwo kutumva no kutavuga, RNUD watangije icyumweru cy’ubukangurambaga bugamije kugaragaza imbogamizi bagifite kugira ngo uburenganzira bwabo bwitabweho, no kugaragaza ko na bo bashoboye.

Icyo kiraro cya metero 60 z'uburebure cyari cyatashywe ku mugaragaro tariki ya 11 Mata 2022 nyuma y'amazi agera kuri atatu cyubakwa.
Guverineri w'Intara y'Amajyepfo, Kayitesi Alice, yabwiye IGIHE ko cyasenyutse bitewe n'imvura yabaye nyinshi cyane.
Ati 'Ikiraro cyacitse mu masaha ya nijoro, abatekinisiye batubwira ko byatewe n'imvura yabaye nyinshi cyane ikuzuza umugezi wa Nyabarongo. Ikiraro rero cyacitse cyegamye ku ruhande rwa Muhanga mu Murenge wa Rongi.'
Yakomeje avuga ko kugeza ubu ishami ry'ingabo z'u Rwanda zirwanira mu mazi zahageze gufasha abaturage kwambuka hakoreshejwe ubwato kugira ngo ubuhahirane hagati y'uturere twombi budahagarara burundu.
Ikindi ngo ni uko itsinda ry'abatekinisiye ndetse na Engineering Brigade yari yacyubatse hamwe n'abakozi b'Ikigo cy'igihugu gishinzwe ubwikorezi no kwita ku mihanda, RTDA, bahageze kugira ngo bafatanye gushaka igisubizo ku kibazo cyabayeho.
Icyo kiraro cyari gifite ubushobozi bwo kwikorera toni 15 bikaba byari biteganyijwe ko kizaramba imyaka 15 abaturage nibagikoresha neza.
Kucyubaka byatwaye amafaranga asaga miliyoni 185Frw.

Ubuyobozi bw’uruganda rukora imigati Ilite Bread bwifurije abakiriya barwo bindashyikirwa n’abanyarwanda muri rusange kuzagira impera z’umwaka nziza byahebuje.
Umuyobo w’uruganda Ilite Bread Ltd, Jean Nsengiyumva avuga ko mu gihe cyo kwizihiza iminsi mikuru bifatanyije n’abakiriya babo babagezaho udushya n’impano bitandukanye.
Nsengiyumva Jean Ati. “Nkuko bisanzwe umugati wacu dukora ufite icyanga cy’umwihariko aricyo gikurura abakiriya bacu bityo rero muriyi minsi mikuru ibiciro twabihananuye kugirango abakiriya bacu bakadasohoka babashe kubona ko natwe tubazirikana.”
Yakomeje agira Ati. “ kubiciro byari bisanzwe k’umugati munini twagabanyije amafaranga ijana (100Frw) naho umuto tugabanyaho amafaranga mirongo itanu (50Frw), kubiciro twari dusanzwe turangurizaho.”
Yasoje ampara impungenge abakunzi b’umugati Ilite Bread ko nta zamuka ry’ibiciro rizigera ribaho vuba aha nkuko byagenze mu minsi ishije igihe ifarini yaburaga ibiciro by’umugati bigatumburuka, ariko kurubu ifarini irahari ntakibazo.
Uruganda rukora Umugati Ilite Bread ruherereye Mu Karere Ka Kamonyi, Umurenge wa Runda, Ku muhanda werekeza Igihara, uramutse ukeneye kurangura wahamagara kuri nimero +250788359804 Cyangwa ukabasanga aho bakorera ku Kamonyi.
By: Bertrand Munyazikwiye

Iminsi 45 yari yihiritse Nshuti Divine Muheto watsindiye ikamba rya nyampinga w’u Rwanda 2022 atarahabwa imodoka iri mibihembo bikuru yemerewe n’umuyobozi wa Hyundayi mu Rwanda Olivier Nizeyimana nk’umuterankunga mukuru w’irushanwa rya Miss Rwanda.
Ubwo Muheto yatsindiraga ikamba rya nyampinga w’u Rwanda mu ijoro ryo kuwa 19 rishyira kuya 20 Werurwe 2022 , Hyundai yagombaga gutanga imodoka nk’igihembo gikuru yamugeneye ubutumwa bumuha ikaze mu muryango mugari wabatunze imodoka za Hyundai ndetse anasezeranwa ko mu minsi ya vuba azabona Hyundai Venue 2022 yatsindiye.

Cyakora uyu muyobozi mu kiganiro yaje kuvuga ko imodka yaje kuhagera gusa ahamya ko gutanga imodoka byo bitamureba ,areiko nanone ko mu mpera ziki cyumweru ntagihindutse Muheto agomba guhabwa iy’imodoka ye.

Polyamide (nanone yitwa PA cyangwa Nylon) nijambo rusange rya resmoplastique resin, irimo amide yisubiramo kumurongo munini wa molekile. PA ikubiyemo alifatique PA, alifatique - impumuro nziza PA na aromatic PA, aho alifatique PA, ikomoka ku mubare wa atome ya karubone muri monomer syntique, ifite ubwoko bwinshi, ubushobozi bwinshi kandi bukoreshwa cyane.
Hamwe na miniaturizasi yimodoka, imikorere myinshi yibikoresho bya elegitoroniki n’amashanyarazi, hamwe no kwihutisha inzira yoroheje y’ibikoresho bya mashini, icyifuzo cya nylon kizaba kinini kandi kinini. Inenge ya Nylon nayo ni ikintu cyingenzi kigabanya imikoreshereze yacyo, cyane cyane kuri PA6 na PA66, ugereranije nubwoko bwa PA46, PA12, bifite inyungu zikomeye, nubwo imikorere imwe idashobora kuzuza ibisabwa byiterambere ryinganda zijyanye nayo.

Nsekarije Alloys ashinzwe ikoranabuhanga mu karere ka Ruhango, avuga ko ubu buryo bwa Document tracking management system ari gahunda izajya yifashishwa mu kohererezanya amadosiye hagati y’abayobozi hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga aho gukoresha impapuro nk’ibisanzwe.
Umuyobozi w’akarere ka Ruhango, Mbabazi Francois Xavier, avuga ko iyi gahunda iziye igihe ngo kuko igiye kubafasha gukoresha neza igihe ngo kuko nta mukozi uzajya utindana dosiye.
Ikindi ngo ni uko ibibazo by’abaturage bitazongera gupfukiranwa, kuko ngo dosiye izajya iba igaragara kuri buri mukozi w’akarere bityo ugomba kuyikurikirana abe azwi ndetse akaba atazashobora kuvuga ngo yari itaramugeraho nk’uko byajyaga biba urwitwazo hagikoreshwa impapuro.
Iyi gahunda ya document tracking management system ishyigikiwe na minisiteri y’ubutegetsi bw’igihugu n’ikigo cy’igihugu gishinzwe iterambere kandi izafasha mu kugabanya amafaranga yasohokaga ku mpapuro.
Ernest Uwimana uyobora umurenge wa Kinihira yemeza ko iyi gahunda izabafasha mu kugabanya ingendo bajyaga bakora bazanye izi raporo, ariko ngo asanga hakenewe amahugurwa ahagije kugira ngo abakozi bose bashobore gukoresha ubu buryo.

Ati “Hari amasomo atabaga mu Rwanda y’ibijyanye no gukanika indege na Gali ya Moshi, ntabwo byari bisanzwe ariko ni porogaramu nshya zirimo kuza muri TVET, kuko muzi ko mu ntumbero y’igihugu cyacu ibijyanye na Gali ya Moshi zigiye kuza mu Rwanda”.

Mu myaka yashize ntabwo Leta yajyaga yunganira kuri icyo kiguzi, ku buryo amashuri yirwanagaho, rimwe na rimwe akazamura amafaranga y’ishuri”.

Naho icyiciro cya Gatatu VTC, ni icy’amasomo atangirwa mu nganda cyangwa muri za Ateliers (Vocational Training Centers), aho abantu biga mu gihe gito akazi kameze nk’agakorerwa muri izo nganda baba bigiramo, abo bashobora kuba batazi no gusoma.
Kuva mu mwaka wa 2011 abamaze kurangiza muri TVET ku rwego rwa Level 5 ni 204.930, mu gihe abarimo kwiga TVET muri uyu mwaka ari 76.955 bari ku rwego rwa Level ya 3 kugera ku ya 5, n’abandi 16.530 bari muri Level ya 1 n’iya 2.

Uyu muhango wabaye ku wa Kane w’iki Cyumweru, uyoborwa n’uhagarariye umuyobozi w’abapolisi bari mu butumwa bwo kurinda amahoro muri iki gihugu mu Ntara ya Upper Nile, Enos Chuma.
Hari kandi abayobozi muri Leta ya Sudani y’Epfo, abakozi b’Umuryango w’Abibumbye, abahagarariye Polisi ya Sudani y’Epfo n’abahagarariye impunzi zakuwe mu byazo n’intambara ubu bakaba barinzwe n’intumwa z’Umuryango w’Abibumbye.

Yagize ati "Uyu munsi ni umwe mu minsi yihariye yo gushimira uruhare rw’abapolisi b’u Rwanda ku bikorwa bakora mu butumwa bw ’umuryango w’abibumbye mu kubungabunga amahoro muri iki gihugu. Turanishimira uruhare rwanyu mu nshingano zanyu i Malakal."

Ernest Nkubana, usanzwe ari umwe mu bayobora gahunda yo kuramya no guhimbaza Imana (Worship leader) mu itorero Zion Temple mu Gatenga ndetse akaba abarizwa muri Asaph International choir, agiye kumurika album ye ya mbere yise ‘Uwiteka ni we Mana’.
Ernest Nkubana uzwi mu ndirimbo ‘Murikira’ yabwiye Inyarwanda.com ko agiye gukora igitaramo cyo kuramya no guhimbaza Imana akazanamurikamo album ye ya mbere yitwa Uwiteka niwe Mana. Iki gitaramo kizabera mu itorero rya Zoin Temple Huye tariki 26 Ugushyingo 2017 kuva isaa munani n'igice, kwinjira akaba ari ubuntu. Ernest yavuze ko muri iki gitaramo cye azaba ari kumwe na Serge Iyamuremye, Mass choir ya Asaph Kigali+Asaph Huye na Fishers of men.
Umuhanzi Ernest Nkubana agiye kumurika album ye ya mbere
TANGA IGITECYEREZO

Abakorera mu gakiriro ka Rusizi barasaba ko umuhanda ujyayo wakorwa, kuko mu bihe by’imvura bituma abagakoreramo batabona abaguzi b’ibyo bakora, kuko uba wanyereye.
Agakiriro ka Rusizi katangiye gukorerwamo mu mwaka wa 2011, abagakoreramo bavuga ko kimwe mu bibangamira imikorere ya bo ari umuhanda uhagera kuko mu bihe by’imvura uba unyerera cyane bikagora abaguzi kuhagera.
Bati “Umuhanda uza hano ku gakiriro ntabwo ujyanye n’igihe kuko n’ibitaka, warangiritse, nk’iyo bigeze mu bihe by’imvura turahomba kuko ntabwo ibinyabiziga bibona uko bitugeraho, bitewe n’uko uba wanyereye abenshi bagatinya ko ibinyabiziga byabo bihagwa cyangwa se bigahera nzira,badufashije bawudukorera kugirango igihe cy’imvura uzabe utunganye”.
Kuri iki kibazo aba baturage bagaragaza, umuyobozi w’Akarere ka Rusizi Kayumba Ephrem avuga ko hari gushakishwa ubushobozi bwo kurangiza ikiciro cya kabiri cyo gukora kano gakiriro, ibyo akaba ari nabyo bizaba ari igisubizo cy’icyo kibazo.
Udukiriro ni gahunda yashyizweho na Leta y’u Rwanda hagamijwe kwegeranya no guhuriza hamwe abakora imyuga n’ubukorikori, kugira ngo bahurize imbaraga hamwe n’abashaka ibyo bakora babibone mu buryo bworoshye, nyamara hirya no hino hagenda humvikanamo ibibazo bijyanye n’inyubako ndetse n’ibikorwa remezo bitorohereza abahakorera n’abakenera ibihakorerwa.
Ubuyobozi bw’Akarere ka Rusizi buvuga ko buri gushaka uko icyiciro cya kabiri cy’aka gakiriro cyakubakwa kikazakemura icyo kibazo.
Eric Habimana

... (280 chars skipped) ...

Mu gihe Will Smith yafuhiraga Tupac, umugore we Jada Pinkett Smith mu 2015 mu kiganiro yagiranye na Howard Stern yavuze ko nta rukundo yigeze agirana n’uyu muraperi wubatse amateka agatabaruka mu Ugushyingo 1996.

The extend to the problem is significant and requires rapid action. In Rwanda, breast and cervical cancers are the most common among women of reproductive age.

... (1456 chars skipped) ... 
e igihe Imana itangiye igikorwa cy’irema. Igitabo cy’Intangiriro kitubwira ko mu ntangiriro ry’iremwa ry’isi n’ijuru, igihe isi yari ikivangavange iriho ubusa, umwijima ubundikiye inyanja n’amazi, umwuka w’Imana wahuhiraga hejuru y’ayo mazi (Intg 1, 1-2). Uwo mwuka w’Imana ni Roho Mutagatifu. Imana igeze ku irema rya muntu ho yaragize iti “Noneho duhange Muntu mu ishusho ryacu, mu misusire yacu…” (Intg 1, 26). Gufata amafunguro yoroheje: Burya kurya ibiryo byinshi kandi bikomeye nijoro ni bibi kuko bikubuza gusinzira neza, ni byiza gufata icyo kurya cyoroheje kitakubuza amahoro ndetse kitari bugore mu igogora bityo ubashe gusinzira neza.

myanda mu mubiri bikagabanya umunaniro, ni byiza kongeramo nibura indimu cyangwa tangawizi kugira ngo ya myanda isohoke neza, ibyo bizagufasha kuzatangira umunsi wawe w’ejo neza nta munaniro na muke ufite.
Kuririmba mu gitondo ubyutse: Mu gihe uri gukaraba witegura gufata icyo kurya cya mu gitondo, ushobora kubikora wiririmbira, wumva radio se, wumva amakuru mashya y’uwo munsi, bizagufasha kwirirwana akanyamuneza ari nabyo bizagufasha kugira umunsi mwiza.

TANGA IGITECYEREZO

Akarere ka Nyagatare gahana imbibe n’igihugu cya Uganda na Tanzaniya.
Ku ruhande rwa Tanzaniya ibihugu byombi bitandukanywa n’Umugezi wa Akagera naho ku ruhande rwa Uganda hakaba akagezi gato bita Umuyanja.
Kubera ubuto bw’ako kagezi usanga abaturage benshi binjira cyangwa basohoka mu gihugu mu buryo butemewe biboroheye.
Imyaka itatu ishize cyane mu Murenge wa Tabagwe, hakunze kuba hari Abagande bahingaga mu Rwanda ndetse na bamwe mu Banywaranda ugasanga bafite imirima muri Uganda.
Umuyobozi w’A
... (1066 chars skipped) ... 
kubireka ari uko kenshi bagiranaga amakimbirane ashingiye ku masezerano babaga bagiranye.
Ati “Mbere yarakodeshaga hegitari agahinga mbonye abonamo umusaruro mwinshi musaba kujya ahinga tukagabana, twarabikoze ariko mbona biraduteranya kuko yabaga ashaka gutwara byinshi kuko ngo ari we wahinze wenyine, akiyibagiza ko ubutaka ari ubwanjye”.
Avuga ko Abagande bazaga guhinga mu Rwanda ari abafite ubutaka buto kandi bakaba begereye u Rwanda.
Avuga ko Abanyarwanda bajyaga guhinga Uganda ari bake cyan
... (1066 chars skipped) ...
go abaturage babicikeho habayeho ubukangurambaga bukomeye.
Ati “Bakoreshaga amato bakambuka Akagera bakajya muri pariki iri hakurya y’umugezi bagaca amakara abandi bakarimbura ibiti bita kabaruka bakongera bakagaruka. Twarabigishije kuko benshi twari twaramaze kubamenya ku bw’amahirwe babicikaho”.
Ikindi cyatumye babicikaho ngo ni impfu zagaragaraga zikomotse kukurohama mu mazi. Ngo amato bayapakiraga imizigo myinshi bagera mu Kagera hagati akibirindura bakagwamo abatazi koga bakahasiga ubuzima.

Ku mugoroba wo ku wa 24 Ukuboza 2020, muri gare ya Muhanga mu Ntara y’Amajyepfo hagaragaye abantu bari bicaye, ariko nta cyizere cyo kubona imodoka kuko ingendo zari zahagaze ndetse ubona n’imiryango y’ahakatirwa amatike ahenshi ifunze. Byatumye rero barara batageze mu ngo iwabo ngo bizihirize Noheli hamwe n’imiryango yabo.
Hari mu ma saa moya n’igice z’umugoroba, aho abo bantu berekezaga mu bice bitandukanye bari babuze icyo gukora, mu gihe bateganyaga kubona uko bataha bakizihiriza Noheli mu miryango yobo, gusa ntibyabakundiye nk’uko Uwicyeza wajyaga mu Majyepfo abivuga.
